story:
“Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn’t do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.” – Mark Twain

 

Let's face it - we all want to live a full, exciting life right?

Have you ever gone on a vacation, seen all the major tourist sights and come home a little underwhelmed? Only to find out days after you return that there was an amazing festival going on just minutes away from where you just were!

Ever thought to yourself, "If I see another church, temple, museum or art gallery I'm going to be sick"?

Or perhaps you just want to know what cool stuff is going on each week where you live.

Well, if you're like most people you can associate with at least one of these scenarios and it's pretty sucky.

So we decided to create a travel community where people could not only discover cool places to go but also turn an average holiday experience into something your grandkids will tell their grandkids about....and TravelByU was born.

 

What is TravelByU?

TravelByU.com (literally Travel By You) is an online travel community with a tool that allows people like you to get personalized travel and festival suggestions tailored to your interests.

It was created by two Aussie guys who are totally passionate about travel.

Michael worked as a travel agent for many years and realized that people are looking for unique experiences, not just a photo of an attraction you can't even remember the name of. He is a festival addict and most recently threw tomatoes along with some 50,000 others at the La Tomatina Festival in Spain.

 

 

James worked for a major online travel brand and taught English in South Korea. He loves diving headfirst into the culture of his destination - be it eating the deadly pufferfish - Fugu/Bok, or getting muddy at the Boryeong Mud Festival. Just make sure you stand well clear if you join him for karaoke...he has some killer dance moves.

 

 

How does it work?

For the Traveler

Imagine for a moment you like scuba diving. How cool would it be if there was a search that showed you all the best places to scuba dive around the world?

 

 

That would be pretty cool right..

Now that's probably going to give you a ton of results so what if you could filter it by popularity, location or even see which places your friends have been to?

 

 

Do we have your attention now....

Well that is exactly what we have been building over the last couple of years and it gets even better too.... the more you use the site the more we learn about you, what you like and where you want to go. This also enables us to recommend festivals and events that YOU will not only like, but are actually able to attend.

So you like dance music and want to visit Sydney, how can we help?

Once you have joined the site simply create a wishlist of the places where you want to go (e.g. Sydney). We are currently working on a system that will automagically send you a message when there is an event you might want to see in that destination.

Interested?  Sign me up! 

 

For the Event Promoter/ DMO

We are building a platform where festival promoters and tourism boards can get their events in front of the exact people who actually want to go. Rather than spamming everyone in the hope of getting visitors, surely it is better to reach your target audience with measured results.

Let's say you are the organizer of an food festival in San Francisco. Wouldn't it be great if you could target all the foodies living in (or visiting) San Francisco when your event is on?

You bet it would.

 

You'll get a designated page to showcase your event, see who is going and what people are talking about.

We will give you the tools and you keep control of your content all for a fraction of the cost of running an online (or offline) advertising campaign.

It doesn't get any better!

 

Where will your money go?

While passion is a great thing unfortunately it doesn't pay the bills. We have been bootstrapping this project using our own time, and more importantly money which has slowed our progress considerably.

Sure we could put Google ads all over the site like Trip Advisor does but who really wants to feel like they landed on a billboard poster? 

Not us!

We have set a goal of $10,000 which will help us survive another few months.   While the money we are asking for may seem like a lot, it will quickly get eaten up by the following:

  • Ongoing server costs - the life support system for the site.
  • Marketing and advertising - this will help to get the word out on the street so more people just like you can find us too.
  • Buckets of coffee and crates of instant noodles - life support for us
  • Offsite web development for another three months - at the moment this is the only person getting paid... and it's coming straight from our wallet

 

 

(We are looking for a rock-star PHP developer to join our team as a technical co-founder. If you are interested and think you've got what it takes please contact us.)

 

 

The Perks

We thought long and hard about how we could give back to the awesome people who are ultimately contributing to our success and came up with some pretty nifty perks.

As it is FREE to become a member on TravelByU we could have gone down the path of early beta access as a perk but to be honest we feel that everyone should be able to have access to the site starting right now!

So instead we tried to keep things pretty light-hearted and fun but also show our sincere gratitude..... c'mon who doesn't like being acknowledged for their generosity.

Of course we do have some pretty special perks too!

THE HIGH TEN: 

That's right folks for your $10 we don't even bother with a high five, we go straight for the high TEN. We will post a short, personalized YouTube video of us giving you a virtual high ten so you can high ten us back. 

Note: If you would like us to mention your business name instead please let us know at the time when you select the perk.

 

ON TOP OF THE WORLD: 

Not just anyone can say they made it to the top of the tallest mountain in Africa - Mount Kilimanjaro at 5,895m (19,340 feet). But if you get this perk your name (your business name or your website) will be printed on a tshirt and worn by a climber at the summit. You will get a photo record of the event and bragging rights that your namesake stood on the peak.

 

THE EARLY BIRD:

If you are an event promoter or tourism board you can take advantage of a huge saving by taking this perk. This promo works out at just $8.50/ per month to have your event promoted on the site.

(That's a saving of over 70% off the regular cost)

 

THE SPONSOR:  

For $250 you can't buy this type of exposure for your business. Here's what you will get:

Your brand will be worn by one of our bloggers to a major festival or event around the world (visible to thousands of people attending the event).

  1. An article on the event from the blogger which will mention that the post is sponsored by your company with a link to your site.
  2. A shout out through our various social media channels.
  3. Major street cred!

 

THE VIP:

This is the ultimate prize. We will arrange for you and a friend to live it up on a 5 day luxury trip to your choice of one of the world's biggest and best festivals.

Think Rio Carnival in Brazil, Oktoberfest in Germany, The Running of the Bulls in Spain, Holi in India or the New Orleans Mardi Gras in U.S.A. just to name a few.

This prize if for 2 people and includes: 4 nights luxury hotel accommodation, return airport transfers, festival tickets and more. (flights not included)

 

A good story is always better when it's shared.

We truly hope that you find our story interesting enough to contribute and share it with your friends so we can make our vision of providing truly amazing, personalized experiences to people's lives a reality.

Now it is up to you to get this party started, so to speak.

 

 

 

Other ways you can help - Contribute to our community!

While we definitely need the cash to get this project off the ground we understand that times are tough so here are some other ways that you can help us out:

  1. Becoming an active member in our travel community - Sharing your experiences, tips and photos on the site helps other members plan better holidays.
  2. Sharing our story and inviting your friends to contribute.
  3. Listing your festival or event on the site. The more events we have to offer, the more useful the site becomes.
  4. Becoming part of our team - We need people to help us in the following areas: travel bloggers, content writers, front and back end developers. 

So come and join us in building the best place to find a good time. Oh yeah we went there! 

Join the community >

 

 

We leave you with this great quote...

 

“Travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.” – Miriam Beard

story:
Iceland, rauður grænn blár 

Hi there! 

We are Polly and Jacopo, a photographer and a developer & designer from Helsinki, Finland. We would like to introduce you to: Iceland, rauður grænn blár.

In June 2013 our dream to visit Iceland finally came true. Ten days and fourteen film rolls after, we have come back to Helsinki with this idea in our heads: putting together a coffee table book with our photographs of the breathtaking Icelandic landscapes.

As we did not want the book to be just a mere collection of images, we thought about involving a selected group of Icelandic poets and writers to help us finding the right words to support our shots.



The writers collaborating with us

When we started to think about the concept of the book, we thought it would have been interesting to collaborate with other artists, to inspire them to put into words the emotions developing from our photographs.

For several weeks we had been looking for Icelandic poets and writers interested in helping us with the book. It was difficult to find the right people!

Eventually we selected five fabulous Icelandic artists:

  • Trausti Dagsson
  • Valur Gunnarsson 
  • Silja Hansen
  • Svala Magnea
  • Brynja Huld Óskarsdóttir

The title of the book

Our book is called "Iceland, rauður grænn blár", in honour of the colours of the Icelandic landscapes: 

  • rauður red: volcanoes, lava fields, fumaroles...
  • grænn green: mountains, green fields, farm lands...
  • blár blue: glaciers, rivers, ocean...

Designing the book

As we love analogue media we have always been very interested in printing.

We have selected the tools and started the design process during the summer. Our focus is to enhance the beauty of the images and the Icelandic language through the use of a clean design and typography. 

We aim in producing a book that you will be proud to display on your bookshelf.

MaccaNow

We have decided to donate a part of what will be raised to a charity, MaccaNow Foundation. 

MaccaNow is Chris McCormack’s foundation, set up to commemorate his mother who passed away from breast cancer in 1999. It provides assistance to families who are in active treatment for breast cancer in order to lessen the financial burdens and improve their quality of life.

About us

Lintustudio is a duo of young creatives based in Helsinki, Finland.

Polly Balitro | http://pollybalitro.com

A 26 year old artist and photographer, interested in analogue image making, traveling, culture and history and especially inspired by the natural environment.

Jacopo Chiapparino | http://jacopochiapparino.com

A 25 year old designer and developer, interested in web, typography, image making, traveling, triathlon, music and inspired by Earth’s beautiful nature.


           


Updates:

26th of October 2013

With this video we wanted to showcase one of the precious poems written by Valur Gunnarsson: "Húsið við sjóinn" (A House by the Sea).
story_txt:
Iceland, rauður grænn blár 
Hi there! 
We are Polly and Jacopo, a photographer and a developer & designer from Helsinki, Finland. We would like to introduce you to: Iceland, rauður grænn blár.


In June 2013 our dream to visit Iceland finally came true. Ten days and fourteen film rolls after, we have come back to Helsinki with this idea in our heads: putting together a coffee table book with our photographs of the breathtaking Icelandic landscapes.


As we did not want the book to be just a mere collection of images, we thought about involving a selected group of Icelandic poets and writers to help us finding the right words to support our shots.








The writers collaborating with us



When we started to think about the concept of the book, we thought it would have been interesting to collaborate with other artists, to inspire them to put into words the emotions developing from our photographs.For several weeks we had been looking for Icelandic poets and writers interested in helping us with the book. It was difficult to find the right people!Eventually we selected five fabulous Icelandic artists:
Trausti Dagsson
Valur Gunnarsson 
Silja Hansen
Svala Magnea
Brynja Huld Óskarsdóttir





The title of the book
Our book is called "Iceland, rauður grænn blár", in honour of the colours of the Icelandic landscapes: 


rauður red: volcanoes, lava fields, fumaroles...

grænn green: mountains, green fields, farm lands...

blár blue: glaciers, rivers, ocean...

Designing the book

As we love analogue media we have always been very interested in printing.


We have selected the tools and started the design process during the summer. Our focus is to enhance the beauty of the images and the Icelandic language through the use of a clean design and typography. 


We aim in producing a book that you will be proud to display on your bookshelf.

MaccaNow
We have decided to donate a part of what will be raised to a charity, MaccaNow Foundation. 
MaccaNow is Chris McCormack’s foundation, set up to commemorate his mother who passed away from breast cancer in 1999. It provides assistance to families who are in active treatment for breast cancer in order to lessen the financial burdens and improve their quality of life.

About us

Lintustudio is a duo of young creatives based in Helsinki, Finland.


Polly Balitro | http://pollybalitro.com
A 26 year old artist and photographer, interested in analogue image making, traveling, culture and history and especially inspired by the natural environment.
Jacopo Chiapparino | http://jacopochiapparino.com
A 25 year old designer and developer, interested in web, typography, image making, traveling, triathlon, music and inspired by Earth’s beautiful nature.





           

Updates:
26th of October 2013
With this video we wanted to showcase one of the precious poems written by Valur Gunnarsson: "Húsið við sjóinn" (A House by the Sea).

story:
Jock Brandis is an award-winning inventor that has been celebrated by Popular Mechanics and MIT for over ten years now thanks to his operations in sustainable technology. Since his foray into philanthropy he has helped to create the Fully Belly Project, a non-profit organization that brings appropriate technology to the poorest parts of the world. Jock and his team have successfully implemented their inventions across the world including Africa, Haiti and the Philippines. Now we need your help to bring the rocker water pump to India.

Like Jock says, hunger is not an issue of food, but of water. Many poor countries, like India have no way of growing a sustainable agriculture through stable irrigation. The rocker water pump can help establish a steady flow of water to help irrigate two acres of land. Your donations will help Jock bring the rocker pump to India and teach the locals how to construct the invention themselves, thus building a micro-enterprise after we have left. We greatly appreciate any amount you can contribute; it will go towards creating a cleaner and more sustainable world.

 

To reiterate what was stated in the video, many farmers around the world would love to work with individuals like Jock, but they simply can’t afford the expenses. Your donations will allow for the transportation of materials, such as the concrete pump molds, to India.

At the proper location, Jock will teach locals how to construct, maintain and operate the rocker water pump. He has successfully implemented his inventions in rural North Carolina, Haiti, the Philippines and Africa.

The lasting impact is the most important factor of the trip and your donation. With your help, locals will be able to irrigate up to two acres of crops with the rocker pump. The invention takes minimal effort to move and operate and can utilize virtually any water source. In addition, all parts will be manufactured and bought locally, thus supporting the local Indian economy and building a micro-enterprise.

story:
Earth Conscious Shoes for Vibrant Living

 

 

I am an orthopedic shoemaker. I've spent my life hand making shoes and helping people with serious foot and ankle conditions.  One thing I have learned is that part of the recipe for great foot health is getting out there and moving. I designed Chenna Baree shoes with this aim in mind.

 

I've been practicing Tai Chi since I was 14 years old.  No other shoe has met my criteria for flexibility and connection to the ground as well as these shoes. The feedback from others has been enthusiastic. On top of that,  the use of sustainable, biodegradable materials matters to me.

Chenna Baree has no gimmicks. It is an honest simple shoe improving upon traditional farming and Kung Fu shoes that have been made for over 80 years without changes. It's a testimony to the idea that foot freedom is part of good foot health. That is why I believe we can build a brand which has the potential to withstand the test of time.  

*Note cotton duck is a type of canvas, not an animal product. These shoes are vegan.

I spent two years studying Chinese in order to make this possible. I knew that in order to find an authentic factory I would have to go to China and where I was going would be off the beaten path. This project would not have been possible without the help of my language partner and good friend Jun Jun and her husband Qin Feng.  With their very kind support I was driven into rural China where you don't see foreigners.  I visited two factories that make the old style shoes that inspired Chenna Baree. The factory that I have chosen to work with touched me very deeply. It forms a community of about sixty people, most of whom live in the nearby village. My two main contacts there, Nan Nan and Echo, both speak passable English. Working with them, as well as with the factory owner Eric has been a wonderful and unique human experience. I am the first Canadian to ever visit their factory, my two sisters and I got a very warm welcome indeed. There were lots of smiles and laughs. Most people have no idea what this might be like. For those of you who are interested, here are a few impressions for you.

 

There is only one way to know if you have a winner. That's to put it to the test. We produced an initial order of Chenna Baree in Purple. Why purple? I was as perplexed as other people, but purple won by a popular public poll. 

Thanks to so many friends and so many other people I don't even know, we have the feedback we need. Everyone wants more colors. That's the verdict. 

I am so glad we did this test run, because our finals have some important changes and quality improvements. It turns out that the linen canvas being very coarse improves with a second saturation of latex in the foxing area. We replaced insole fiber with canvas belting, and we replaced a glued in insole with a removable one. So that is why I refer to the purple shoes as Prototypes, because there are changes and quality improvements made to the final production specs. And that's what testing is all about.

 

This is the whole idea. We need you in order to make this happen.  I believe that we have demonstrated our investment, our commitment and our integrity. The challenge now is getting these shoes to their rightful owners. That's you!  

We appreciate you sharing this project with your friends. It's this spirit that makes Indiegogo such a wonderful way for startup companies to connect with a market. Thank you so much.

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust.

Beautiful, classic red linen canvas.

Another classic. Beautiful blue linen canvas

Olive Green  Slightly conservative but where can you find this shoe?

Grey. All round conservative gorgeous linen canvas

Chenna Baree's flagship- the now famous Purple Shoe!

Yes you did!  And we hope to bring in more colors too.  When we reach $95.000  in total funding we will add Orange and Lime. With your help we can get there! 

 

We want to build an ethical earth conscious brand of footwear for active living. By doing so we not only provide great employment, but we reduce vast quantities of synthetics from entering the landfill. 

Chenna Baree is about the marriage of beauty, function and sustainability. We want to deliver to you a unique, highly functional shoe which will be made for many years to come.  That means, you will always want to have a pair in your active collection.   

Becoming part of our support network is a choice that you will feel great about.

 

We have gone to great lengths to realize this project. Learning Chinese has not been the least of it. We are excited and ready for production. We are confident that we can make deliveries by August 2017. 

It is only fair to say that unforeseen situations may arise. There may be delays either in production or shipping due to such circumstances. If there is a problem, we will be up front and communicative with our backers.

Sizing is potentially a problem for some customers. We have provided the best information we can to help you choose the right size. If there is a problem, contact us and we will provide you with options.

There have been cases where campaigns have met with great difficulty when they have received many more supporters than expected. We are prepared to meet 3 times our  goal without anticipated delay. Beyond that, we anticipate that shipping would be delayed for an estimated 8 weeks to schedule additional production.

story:
Introducing the Voyage Bag

by Sondre Travel

 

The Voyage Bag is the essential travel bag for everyday life that combines a forward thinking minimal design and versatile functionality for unlimited possibilities. Our 2-in-1 design allows the Voyage Bag to be a comfortable backpack or full size duffel bag when you are on the go. Pack for any occasion with the open pocket design and multi-functional interior dividing pouches. From daily use to trips & adventures, the Voyage Bag will always adapt to be the perfect travel companion!

 Secure our best pricing for the Voyage Bag today and become a part of the Voyage Family.

As our campaign continues to grow we will unlock new and exciting additions to the Voyage Bag. Share our campaign with your friends to help unlock each Stretch Goal!

 

Exterior Fabric

The Voyage Bag features a rugged 300D Polyester fabric that is water resistant against the elements while being lightweight enough to move with ease when you are on the move.

We kept the exterior design sleek and streamlined with a two tone Grey & Black colorway to fit any occasion - from business trip to weekend camping. Pack all your essentials with style and confidence. 

Carrying the Voyage Bag

Our unique strap system allows the Voyage Bag to be carried any number of ways from a comfortable backpack, a shoulder duffel bag, or use either of the two easy grip handles when you to grab and go. 

Quickly and easily switch between a backpack and duffel bag with our rapid-release hidden velcro compartment for the backpack straps. 

The 2-in-1 design allows you to adapt the Voyage Bag mid-trip to allow for the most comfortable traveling experience. 

The included shoulder strap quickly clips onto the two black metal rings to comfortably carry the Voyage Bag across your chest.

Two easy to grab handles are located on the top and middle of the bag for those times when you want to head out in a flash!

For longer trips, the Voyage Bag is compatible with your roller luggage!

Packing the Voyage Bag

We wanted the Voyage Bag to adapt to your life for any occasion from your daily commute, heading to class, a weekend carry-on, camping, and any adventure you could imagine! 

To achieve this, the Voyage Bag features a large open center compartment with two mutli-purpose flexible compartments on either side of the bag. 

You can easily store your shoes, separate clean and dirty laundry, keep your water bottle in place, pack carry-on essentials, or simply not use them at all! The possibilities are truly endless!

Access anything inside the Voyage Bag from our rear entry zippers located on either side of the bag. Perfect for overhead plane compartments when you can't fully open the bag.  

Adapt the Voyage Bag to fit your needs - How will you pack it?

Pocket Design

Other travel bags can be overwhelming with unnecessary pockets made for packing specific items.  We purposefully designed the Voyage Bag to have just the right amount of storage for any of your travel essentials. 

The exterior of the Voyage Bag features:

  • 1 quick access pocket on top 
  • 1 large open font pocket 
  • 1 large open side pocket with mesh organizer

To keep your laptop and tablet protected, a fleece lined laptop sleeve (up to 15" laptops) and tablet pocket are located inside the Voyage Bag. A strap will keep both items safely in place. Swap out your tablet for a notebook whenever you need.

The interior zip pocket is perfect for those small valuable items you want to keep safely inside and away. 

Never be without any of your essential travel products.

At Sondre Travel, every detail counts to have the best travel expierence! We spent months perfecting all of the finishing details of the Voyage Bag. Some of these details includes a secure hook and leash to store your keys safely inside the bag, a bright electric blue interior lining to stand out against your belongings, and rugged paracord zipper pulls for added durability. 

Check out all of the fine details that make the Voyage Bag special. 

Technical Specifications

The Voyage Bag is the perfect size for any type of travel adventure.

 

 

As an early backer, you will lock in exclusive introductory pricing for the Voyage Bag before it is launched to the general public and in retail stores. Choose your reward level and join the exclusive early backer community!

Don't miss your chance to secure our best exclusive pricing!

 

Have any questions before you become a backer - email us anytime at info@sondretravel.com 

 

 

Having experience previously launching a crowdfunding campaign, we know how important it is to ensure that we are always 100% transparent with the campaign timeline. Our previous campaign for the Voyage Pillow shipped on-time for our backers (with some arriving earlier than promised!).

We have already taken the steps to ensure we stick to the below timeframe so you have your hands on the Voyage Bags as soon as possible. As always, if any delays occurring during the process we will outline them in our updates. We strive to be one of the best crowdfunding campaigns you have ever backed!

 

   

 

 

Sondre Travel was founded on Kickstarter with the launch of the Voyage Pillow in February 2017 raising $125,000 after our crowdfunding campaign was finished!

Sondre Travel's founder, Matt Benedetto, loves to travel and has been designing products for over 10 years across multiple different industries with our headquarters located in beautiful Burlington Vermont!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Marina Martinez and I recently graduated California State University Monterey Bay. During my last semester there, my classmates and I in the Cinematic Arts and Technology department created short films about Fort Ord and collected veteran stories for the Library of Congress. Our student short films have been compiled into a compilation entitled Fort Ord: A Sense of Place. This compilation will be screened at the Smithsonian National Gallery of Art on March 18th 2017, we will also be presenting the veteran stories we collected to the Library of congress On March 17th 2017. I am hoping to raise enough money for my travel expense so that I will be able to attend all the events on March 17th and 18th. A short film that I did with three other students is called Every GI Is A POW .

http://www.nga.gov/content/ngaweb/calendar/film...

 

Breakdown of Expenses

  • The current cheapest roundtrip ticket from San Francisco to Washington D.C. is around $400, as it gets closer to March, the ticket prices will go up.
  • A cheap hotel room is around $200 a night in the area of Washington D.C. I will be staying in. I will need to stay a minimum of three nights, possibly 4 depending on flight options (cheaper connecting flights are around 8hrs long). 
  • Food

The Impact

I am going to be straight with you, I currently live paycheck to paycheck and stick to a budgeting plan so that all my bills get paid on time. That being said I don't have a lot of leeway with money when opportunities like this present themselves. I never thought a short film that I was a part of would screen at the Smithsonian National Gallery of Art or that I would be invited to go to Washington D.C. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity/experience and because of that I have to try and not let money be the reason I can't attend these events.

 

Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign with your friends! Any action counts!

During my last semester there, my classmates and I in the Cinematic Arts and Technology department created short films about Fort Ord and collected veteran stories for the Library of Congress. Our student short films have been compiled into a compilation entitled Fort Ord: A Sense of Place. This compilation will be screened at the Smithsonian National Gallery of Art on March 18th 2017, we will also be presenting the veteran stories we collected to the Library of congress On March 17th 2017. I am hoping to raise enough money for my travel expense so that I will be able to attend all the events on March 17th and 18th. A short film that I did with three other students is called Every GI Is A POW .
http://www.nga.gov/content/ngaweb/calendar/film...

 
Breakdown of Expenses

The current cheapest roundtrip ticket from San Francisco to Washington D.C. is around $400, as it gets closer to March, the ticket prices will go up.
A cheap hotel room is around $200 a night in the area of Washington D.C. I will be staying in. I will need to stay a minimum of three nights, possibly 4 depending on flight options (cheaper connecting flights are around 8hrs long). 
Food


The Impact
I am going to be straight with you, I currently live paycheck to paycheck and stick to a budgeting plan so that all my bills get paid on time. That being said I don't have a lot of leeway with money when opportunities like this present themselves. I never thought a short film that I was a part of would screen at the Smithsonian National Gallery of Art or that I would be invited to go to Washington D.C. This is a once in a lifetime opportunity/experience and because of that I have to try and not let money be the reason I can't attend these events.
 
Thank you for taking the time to read my campaign!
 
Other Ways You Can HelpShare this campaign with your friends! Any action counts!

story:
Send Emmet To Trem

So Emmet is buying a ticket to Trem from LaRose, but he doesn't have enough money. We need to raise $500 for him to go. Donate $10-$20 if you want to go to heaven. He promises to pay you back. THIS IS SERIOUS, NOT A JOKE!

Thanks,

Vincent Gibowic

story:
Love to travel outdoor but irritating with melted ice in a traditional cooler? Want to keep food fresh when traveling? Want to buy a refrigerator but keep hesitating because of its high price? ICECO iCooler gets all you want.

ICECO iCooler completely solves your problems! This is a perfect combination of traditonal cooler, refrigerator and freezer. 

It is carefully designed by the team who have won the IDEA and German Reddot Award, also manufactured by luxury car refrigerator suppliers. ICECO provides 1-year warranty and US local after-sales service for all US backer!

Whether you're camping out or playing games at home, iCooler keeps ice cream freeze and keep drinks cold at your fingertips! Come and prepare for the coming summer!


Overview

✅ 3 in 1 Refrigerator. Fridge/Freezer/Cooler
✅ PreciseTemperature Control : 0℉-50℉ (-18℃~+10℃)
✅ Car & Home Use: 12V/24V/110V/220V
✅ Keep Ice Cold for 90+ hours Even Off Power
✅ Rotomolding Design
✅ Function: 30° Anti-Shake, Energy Saving, Car Battery Protection


 

ICECO iCooler VS. Old Fashion Cooling Method

iCooler perfectly combines the advantages of traditional coolers and powered fridge. No worry about the melted ice, get rid of the shackles of bulky home refrigerators! iCooler is not just a Cooler nor a freezer!

Dry & Clean

When the power is on, no melted ice in bulky coolers any more. You can keep your fridge dry and clean! 

 


Use As Freezer and Cooler

Compressor refrigerator function. When the power is switched on, the iCooler is a mobile refrigerator, which can be used for refrigeration and freezing. When the power is off, effective thermal insulation design makes the iCooler become a traditional cooler.

When the iCooler used as a freezer, the Temperature Precise Control range from 0°F to +50°F

 

No Ice Packs Needed

A new generation has arrived! Unlike the old fashion cooler, the actual usable space of iCooler is much larger than the coolers of the same capacity. You can open the freezer and take out the food at any time. The most important point is, you can save a lot of money to buy ice.

 

Home & Car Use- Multi-channel to connect power

This iCooler can be connected to every power source that supports AC/DC output. No need to worry about the power source anymore. Starting a long road trip, having a picnic, gathering camping, iCooler keeps the food 100% fresh.  

 

MAX & ECO Modes

For different needs, two modes were designed. iCooler can be adjusted according to your demand. The MAX Mode has fast cooling speed and relatively powerful freezing ability. Meanwhile, the ECO mode saves energy. The ECO mode is mainly designed for outdoor environments that have limited energy.

 

Well adapted to Complex environment and anti-shaking

This freezer is strong and solid. It is suitable for frequent movements, it also can work normally under 55 ° C, UV resistance, aging resistance, impact resistance, and flame resistance. Moreover, it can even work in a bumpy range of 30° without affecting use.

 

3-Stage Battery Protection System, Extra protection for the car battery!

Automatically shuts the product off to prevent a dead car starter battery Features a 3-Stage Dynamic Battery Protection that can prevent your car battery from running down when connected with your carport. An ECU program for low-voltage battery protection, EMC anti-electromagnetic interference, and Current overload protection design protects the device while you're on the road.

 

EMC Standard and Test Result

This freezer has been approved to EMC standard, which means that different electronic devices operate in close proximity to each other without causing mutual interference.

 

Portable Design

 

Convenient Cup Holder

Easy to storage and carry gadgets (Square for bottles caps, opener, round for juices, bottles, etc)

Strong and tight handles

Hold and pull-down to open/close the door, keep cool and catch the fridge tightly.  

Is it hard to carry the refrigerator? Difficult to fixed? Don’t worry about that, Each iCooler Handles are equipped with a hole to help you deal with it. It makes your trip much easier and relaxed.  

Some people are hesitant about choosing a cooler or refrigerator. ICECO iCooler turned portable refrigerator design upside down, realized the refrigerator and cooler in one machine. You could use it according to your needs. There's a problem with using a cooler, melting ice, messy box, but with iCooler, you do not worry about this, open the scupper, can keep your cooler fridge clean and clean.

 

Take and Go

Addons

ICECO iCooler VS others

 

3 Color Selections

 

Timeline

We will make our best to give you the best service, here is our planning:

 

Story behind us

ICECO always on the way to improving our product, and want to provide the best portable freezer to you. Here’s an outline of ICECO iCooler

Our Team

Frank (Founder): ICECO is inspired by Frank, an expert in developing  refrigeration and road life with more than 15 years, he seeks to provide more cooling and preservation solutions for those who on the move.

Benny (Chief Product Officer): When you add an extra machine in car, you need to make sure everything goes well, so this is Benny consideration, ensure that the fridge are not interfered with the operation of vehicle.

Rain (Product Manager):  ICECO iCooler was designed by the winner of Reddot Award and IDEA Award, Rain, who has over 10 years working on production and test for the portable fridge.

ICECO team with decades of experience in developing, manufacturing and distributing portable freezers. ICECO performs our duties, we have a professional after-sales team in the US, devoting to provide the best service to our customers.

story:
NEW to Indiegogo? Got Questions? Try our Answer Bot ? here.  

Hate being cold? Us too. So, instead of continuing to fight with bulky layers, we decided to make a lightweight, heated jacket that's 10X more powerful than its competitors - that's heat you can ACTUALLY FEEL!

Risks and challenges

This is our seventh crowdfunding campaign, we've learned a lot throughout our last five campaigns - not to mention the last 9 years of business ;). We like to think that we're getting better and better at what we do. As with tackling anything new, we know there will be challenges along the way, we know there will be set backs, but rest assured we never slow down - not even a little. We're 115% pedal to the metal kinda company that doesn't take no for an answer.

There are a few items that could challenge us and our time line.
1) Power Packs, we've already done the development for these so that's a huge plus for this campaign! We know there will be many unforeseen challenges when we move to final production, but we're brave and ready to face them!
2) Fabric, this is the second longest lead item in our supply chain and if the produced fabric does not meet our high quality control specifications it will have to be redone. This could cause an unforeseen delay.
3) Shipping around the world always presents risk, we source from several suppliers around the world and our logistics web is quite complex - so there's always potential for crazy unexpected delays at home or abroad. PLEASE NOTE, ALL CUSTOMS / DUTIES IN YOUR COUNTRY ARE YOUR RESPONSIBILITY - THIS IS OUT OF OUR HANDS. Sometimes international shipments experience unforeseen delays that are out of our control.
4) If we add-on any new products during this campaign, we could experience delays.
5) If we receive a monstrosity of backers (awesome) we could experience a slight delay, however we do feel confident in our supply chain and it's scalability.

We are partnered with "Best in Industry" suppliers and manufacturers that not only represent high quality products but they also mirror our values as a company in 'better than fair' labor and excellent employee conditions. We put boots on the ground in all of the facilities we work with, inspecting the entire process of our products - ensuring most importantly that people are treated with respect, dignity, and fairness.

Please note that we are a small company and we are dependent on several other companies staying in business and doing their job well - so with the launch of new products we sure do appreciate your patience! Our policy is honesty, transparency, and customer service in every aspect of our business. You make this happen and we will do everything we can to exceed your expectations, serve you, and equip you for adventure! Thanks for joining us!
story_txt:
NEW to Indiegogo? Got Questions? Try our Answer Bot ? here.  
Hate being cold? Us too. So, instead of continuing to fight with bulky layers, we decided to make a lightweight, heated jacket that's 10X more powerful than its competitors - that's heat you can ACTUALLY FEEL!

 

 

 
Tired of BULKY LAYERS? Ember gives you the warmth of multiple layers without all the bulk, thanks to it's high energy heat!    
 

 

Ember comes as both a half-zip pullover or a full-zip hooded jacket. Both provide instant heat and incredible comfort and are powered by our industry-leading, 60-watt, USBC-PD power packs! 
Plus, Ember is available in a male and female-specific fit to ensure you find the perfect match for your body type.
 

 

 


 

Finally, a heated jacket that delivers on instant heat that you can actually feel! Check out the video below to learn more about how we took a cue from Apple and other big players in the tech industry and invested in USB-C PD.

 

 

 

 

 

 

You want to warm up, not break a sweat. So, we built in breathability where you need it most! High-stretch, high-flow grid fleece flow vents on the back and under the arms allow excess heat to escape — BEFORE you break a sweat. 

 

 
 

 

Ember features a windproof and water-resistant nylon exterior to keep moisture at bay when your adventures get more "adventurous."  

 
Plus, waterproof heat panels and an IP65 rated Power Pack means that Ember stays warm and protected in even the heaviest downpour! 
 

 

 

 
Inside of Ember, natural bamboo fibers and the “supermaterial” graphene join forces to create an insulating dream-team.
The bamboo fibers naturally draw sweat away from your body — keeping you warmer, longer. Plus, bamboo’s incredible antimicrobial properties repel odors and keep your jacket stink-free! 
 

Then there’s graphene… a natural thermal conductor that springs to life when the heat panels are activated. Simply put, instead of relying on the centralized heat from the core panels, graphene absorbs the warmth and conducts it throughout the entire jacket keeping you warm all over. 

With instant heat at the push of a button, Ember reduces or completely removes the need for bulky layers — no matter where you decide to wear it! 

 


 

 



 
 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 


 
 


 
 

 We’re hell-bent on wiping out the disease and suffering caused by unclean drinking water. We’ve built giving back into our business model so that we can multiply our efforts and bring clean water to those in desperate need. For every ONE branded product purchased, we’re able to provide clean water for one person for an entire year. 


We're a small-but-mighty team of adventurous souls who love creating gear that lets you experience the wild in comfort!  
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Risks and challenges
This is our seventh crowdfunding campaign, we've learned a lot throughout our last five campaigns - not to mention the last 9 years of business ;). We like to think that we're getting better and better at what we do. As with tackling anything new, we know there will be challenges along the way, we know there will be set backs, but rest assured we never slow down - not even a little. We're 115% pedal to the metal kinda company that doesn't take no for an answer.

We know there will be many unforeseen challenges when we move to final production, but we're brave and ready to face them!2) Fabric, this is the second longest lead item in our supply chain and if the produced fabric does not meet our high quality control specifications it will have to be redone. This could cause an unforeseen delay.3) Shipping around the world always presents risk, we source from several suppliers around the world and our logistics web is quite complex - so there's always potential for crazy unexpected delays at home or abroad. PLEASE NOTE, ALL CUSTOMS / DUTIES IN YOUR COUNTRY ARE YOUR RESPONSIBILITY - THIS IS OUT OF OUR HANDS. Sometimes international shipments experience unforeseen delays that are out of our control.4) If we add-on any new products during this campaign, we could experience delays.5) If we receive a monstrosity of backers (awesome) we could experience a slight delay, however we do feel confident in our supply chain and it's scalability.
We are partnered with "Best in Industry" suppliers and manufacturers that not only represent high quality products but they also mirror our values as a company in 'better than fair' labor and excellent employee conditions. We put boots on the ground in all of the facilities we work with, inspecting the entire process of our products - ensuring most importantly that people are treated with respect, dignity, and fairness.
Please note that we are a small company and we are dependent on several other companies staying in business and doing their job well - so with the launch of new products we sure do appreciate your patience! Our policy is honesty, transparency, and customer service in every aspect of our business. You make this happen and we will do everything we can to exceed your expectations, serve you, and equip you for adventure! Thanks for joining us!

story:
Update ! 

Thank you so much to everyone who has contributed to our campaign ! We are so grateful for the enthusiastic support. We will  keep the Indiegogo up for a limited time longer so contribute now if you want in on these pretty amazing deals.

We also want to let you know that all perks will likely ship out at the very end of December and are not guaranteed to arrive by Christmas Day. For more info, please visit our Updates page. Thank you !

Travel Mats by Starwater Yoga

Ever since we launched our brand last year, people have been asking for travel mats . We are excited to finally bring them to you. These mats offer all the brilliance of our regular mats yet with so much more. 

Our travel yoga mats are:

  • Lightweight - Under two pounds each 
  • Easily portable - Can be folded small
  • Made with natural tree rubber and microfiber suede
  • Grippy, sturdy + absorbant
  • Super soft and luxurious to touch
  • Suitable for hot yoga and all other forms
  • Machine washable
  • Fine art quality 
  • Featuring powerful and intentional imagery by Jamila Starwater Tazewell

What We Need & What You Get

Reaching our $7500 goal will allow us to launch these dynamic new travel mats, maybe even in time for the holidays.  This is the cost to manufacture and print the opening order. We have spent months sourcing the perfect material and print quality. 

By supporting our campaign, you are helping us get out in to the world with a new product that we believe will make a difference in peoples practice and life.

In return, you will be able to choose receive an array of our existing products and will be among the first to have these new travel mats, all at significant discounts. 

We're so excited to share our perks with you!

Here is what we are offering to you in gratitude for your support!

The Solo Perk

1 Travel Mat // $35

Be one of the first to have a Starwater Travel Mat !

Four beautiful designs to choose from, each created with a specific intention to help channel and guide your practice.

The travel mats will be retailing at $60, so this is your chance to get yours at near wholesale prices.

The Holiday Perk

1 Travel Mat + 1 Meditation Journal // $50

This is the perfect option for everyone on your holiday shopping list!  A gift set of 1 Travel Mat and 1 coordinating Meditation Journal from our sister brand, 11:11 Enterprises.  The journal covers are hand sewn in our Los Angeles studio and come with a Moleskine cahier large notebook.  The notebooks can be refilled.

While we will do our best to make sure that our Travel Mats are here in time for the holidays, this perk guarantees that you will have a gift for your loved ones in time for your celebrations.  All Meditation Journals are guaranteed to ship by the beginning of December, free of any additional shipping costs.

The Friend Perk

2 Travel Mats // $65

One for you and one for them! Show your gratitude to that friend that is always down to go to class with you.  Or get one for you and one for your 'yoga-curious' loved one. Can't decide which design you love more - get both for yourself!  Now you don't have to choose!

The Happy Family Perk

4 Travel Mats // $120

An excellent opportunity to have all 4 designs!  Prices will not be this low again. Buy in bulk for gifts or buy them all for yourself. This is perfect for anyone with a daily practice, particularly for yogis with a hot, sweaty practice. The mats are machine washable!

The Golden Bundle Perk

1 Travel Mat + 1 Yoga Mat + 1 Meditation Journal // $140

Our most complete individual package.  Hold space for your practice in your home and out in the world.  This perk includes one of our original Starwater Yoga Mats, made of dense, durable natural rubber, with a fine art quality print on top.  These mats make a statement wherever they lay.  $140 is the retail price of the Yoga Mat alone, making this an excellent buy on three perfectly coordinated pieces.  Or mix and match the designs!  Our Yoga Mat comes in 9 different design intentions.

The Business Perk

10 Travel Mats // $285

This is a great option for yoga studios + stores that want carry our new travel yoga mats and get them at a lower than wholesale price. Also a cool idea for corporate gifts. However, you do not need to have a business to take advantage of this amazing deal. 

 

The Deluxe Family Perk

2 Travel Mats + 2 Yoga Mats + 2 Meditation Journals + 2 Meditation Pillows // $365

This is a beautiful option for a yoga loving couple or small family that want to give themselves or their loved ones a truly unique and uplifting suite of gifts. Mix and Matching designs is welcome! 

The Golden Family Perk

4 Travel Mats + 4 Yoga Mats + 4 Meditation Journals + 4 Meditation Pillows // $680

Our most abundant package, perfect for a family of yoga lovers or anyone who would like to get a great deal on our whole line. You are welcome to mix and match from any yoga mat we sell on our website, just send us a message along with your order. 

More About Our Designs 

Our designs are created with intention, color, sacred geometry and symbolism.  Each element has a story and meaning behind it. Each art piece is consciously constructed by Jamila using mantra and meditation to open up a high vibrational space. She then downloads the art into two dimensional form. The result is artwork with depth and resonance which can help the make the practitioner more centered and empowered.

Destiny, Energy, Prosperity, and Peace are the four designs we are offering as Travel Mats. See below for a detailed chart of each design and it's meanings :

Personal Message from Jamila

My teacher always says, "Point your mind in a positive, useful direction". The symbols and all the elements that make up the designs have a resonance that aligns you with your higher nature. The idea is that just by looking at them, you are pointing your mind in a positive, useful direction.

Research shows that visual imagery is processed 60,000 times faster than text. When you surround yourself with positive uplifting imagery, you program your mind for success. My intention is that these yoga mats truly support and inspire you in your practice and your life. 

Risks & Challenges

I created my first business, 11:11 Enterprises as a way to put my art on useful, everyday objects like wallets, passport covers, and more.  I’ve been lucky enough to keep that business alive and successful for fifteen years.  However, small business is very challenging.  

As an artist, the hard part is balancing the creative aspect with the marketing and day to day tasks of running a business.  Launching a brand new product from scratch is daunting.  It’s hard work and that’s why we’re doing this campaign.  It’s a way to announce the new yoga mats so that people can really see them and give us feedback.  In this way we can better ensure our success with the help of the people like you, and our world wide yoga community.

Other Ways You Can Help

As a grassroots independent company we value your word of mouth support - SO MUCH. 

Please share our campaign with your friends via social media!

Thank you.

The Deluxe Family Perk

2 Travel Mats + 2 Yoga Mats + 2 Meditation Journals + 2 Meditation Pillows // $365
This is a beautiful option for a yoga loving couple or small family that want to give themselves or their loved ones a truly unique and uplifting suite of gifts. Mix and Matching designs is welcome! 
The Golden Family Perk

4 Travel Mats + 4 Yoga Mats + 4 Meditation Journals + 4 Meditation Pillows // $680
Our most abundant package, perfect for a family of yoga lovers or anyone who would like to get a great deal on our whole line. You are welcome to mix and match from any yoga mat we sell on our website, just send us a message along with your order. 


More About Our Designs 
Our designs are created with intention, color, sacred geometry and symbolism.  Each element has a story and meaning behind it. Each art piece is consciously constructed by Jamila using mantra and meditation to open up a high vibrational space. She then downloads the art into two dimensional form. The result is artwork with depth and resonance which can help the make the practitioner more centered and empowered.
Destiny, Energy, Prosperity, and Peace are the four designs we are offering as Travel Mats. See below for a detailed chart of each design and it's meanings :



Personal Message from Jamila

My teacher always says, "Point your mind in a positive, useful direction". The symbols and all the elements that make up the designs have a resonance that aligns you with your higher nature. The idea is that just by looking at them, you are pointing your mind in a positive, useful direction.
Research shows that visual imagery is processed 60,000 times faster than text. When you surround yourself with positive uplifting imagery, you program your mind for success. My intention is that these yoga mats truly support and inspire you in your practice and your life. 


Risks & Challenges
I created my first business, 11:11 Enterprises as a way to put my art on useful, everyday objects like wallets, passport covers, and more.  I’ve been lucky enough to keep that business alive and successful for fifteen years.  However, small business is very challenging.  
As an artist, the hard part is balancing the creative aspect with the marketing and day to day tasks of running a business.  Launching a brand new product from scratch is daunting.  It’s hard work and that’s why we’re doing this campaign.  It’s a way to announce the new yoga mats so that people can really see them and give us feedback.  In this way we can better ensure our success with the help of the people like you, and our world wide yoga community.


Other Ways You Can Help
As a grassroots independent company we value your word of mouth support - SO MUCH. 
Please share our campaign with your friends via social media!
Thank you.

story:
Canyon is the all-terrain sneaker with 4-in-1 versatility: providing the benefits of aqua shoes, the comfort of sport shoes, the technical outsole materials of hiking shoes, and the styling of your favourite daily pieces. 

 

The all-terrain sneaker category was born to meet the needs of modern day travelers who desire to always be ready to jump into a new adventure anytime, anywhere. Keeping this in mind, we have designed Canyon, our best travel shoe yet.

In order to cover all our necessities man has designed a lot of different kind of shoes: sneakers, outdoor shoes, hiking shoes, aqua shoes, slippers… However all this footwear is so specific that if we don’t want to have any problem while packing for the next big adventure, we are forced to sacrifice on comfort and convenience.

 Afters hours of investigation, research & development and customization, we have raised our game to craft a better travel shoe that delivers premium quality, high-tech performance and maximum comfort. 

 What you can't see, it's what matters the most. It’s all about the little things that make the difference. In design, we like to think that Less is More. 

The Cruiser Backpack is your must-pack travel gear for your next vacation.  It fits in your pocket, it's great for wet and dry conditions and provides you maximum comfort. 

 

 We consider ourselves a collaborative brand, that is why for us, our community support is vital and we will not tire of thanking it. Involving the Kickstarter community in new launches is essential to the quality growth of our business, as it allows us to design and develop the product that we want without investors. 

 

 

 1. Click Back this Project Below: 

Select the available reward tier you would like to pledge on the right side of the page or click here. Each backer may only make one pledge. 

 2. Payment: 

Enter your payment information. Your payment will not be charged until the very end of this campaign 

3. Size, Color & Shipping Information: 

Don’t worry about that yet! You will get to select your

Size, Color choice and submit your Shipping at the very end of this campaign.

We are a young and diverse team of travelers coming from different parts of the world with a shared mission of making the everyday an exciting adventure!

story:
Hello INDIEGOGO - we've got news!

Thank you for an epic campaign in 2018 - and with 4.634 backers it was the most successful snow goggle campaign, as in ever! We're truly grateful for the trust and support you gave us back then.

After a messy weekend of celebrating the success of our last goggle campaign, we challenged ourselves once again: to launch a new high-quality goggle that looks amazing, and comes with our new high-quality lens that puts them right up amongst the top players in the market. But at half the price (at least) - and at the same time keeping it true to our cause of ensuring the clean-up of 2 kg of plastic waste from the Pacific Ocean pr. product sold. 

Quite a challenge, yes -  however after countless hours back in the lab as well as testing on- and off the slopes, we're now confident that we've done it again! 

 

We give you, the Inuit goggles with two new lens technologies: XE2 and XEp

 

In case you don't know us yet, we're all about high-quality and great design wrapped in affordable prices. The Inuit is exactly that.

Check out GloboSurf's Review about us.

 

The XE2 lens: High Contrast

The easy interchangeable XE2-lens is an improvement of our XE1 lens. The dual-layered lens is manufactured of a grade 1 optical quality polycarbonate, which makes them both thin, light-weight, and practically unbreakable. They provide a high-contrast view, and the violet base secures enhanced color recognition unveiling details normally invisible for the naked eye. With an XE2 lens, contrast-enhancing dyes are added to fine-tune the light spectrum and thereby increase contrasts and reduce glare, developed explicitly for snow sport and mountain conditions.

The XE2 is one of the best High Contrast lenses on the market and most affordable... You will not believe it before you try it!

 

The XEp lens: High Contrast and Photochromic

The XEp lens is a photochromic version of the XE2 lens, meaning it adapts to any weather condition, automatically. The lens reacts to a combination of sunlight and UV-rays, resulting in photochromic molecules constantly recalibrate as the light changes. This causes the lenses to darken in only up to 20 seconds when it is sunny and vise versa then the sun disappears. During these rapid transitions, full UV400 protection is guaranteed. We've manufactured the lens with a patented molded-in film technology, which ensures the highest optical quality, uniformed color change as well as weather resistance. 

Check out the video below where the Danish national ski team coach -Frederik Højgaard - demonstrate the XEp lens.

 

 

Complete package with everything you need

All packages will be delivered with a complete package of everything you need for any condition.

The XE2 package includes:

  • MW frame
  • MW strap with anti-slip
  • Inuit XE2 high-contrast lens
  • 1 extra overcast/snow-lens
  • 2 x microfiber pouches
  • 1 x hard box

 

The XEp package includes:

  • MW frame
  • MW strap with anti-slip
  • Inuit XEp Photochromic high-contrast lens
  • 1 x microfiber pouches
  • 1 x hard box

 

 

The Inuit frame is manufactured of a lightweight TPU (thermoplastic polyurethane) which is both extremely flexible and durable while ensuring an excellent fit for all faces and helmets. The foam technology is triple-layered to ensure airflow for preventing fogging and comfort. 

 

The straps are easily interchangeable meaning you can change the look of the entire goggle in just two clicks. To ensure an even fresher look, we've used a matt-finish silicone for the logos. Also, the straps are fitted with triple silicone linings to prevent unwanted slipping. 

 The limited-edition pro straps are inspired by our hero and icon Glen Plake - the godfather of freestyle. You'll easily recognize the same 80's vibe in these straps as you get from our home shopping theme in the video.

All current packages will be shipping in February.

 

 

PLASTIC CLEAN UP 

As with our previous campaign and our everyday business, plastic clean-up is fundamental to us. When we started MessyWeekend, it was clear that we needed to give back in one way or another. We're not saving the planet with our 1=2 program. However, as a small start-up, we're doing what we can to spread awareness about the challenges as hopefully inspire other companies to follow. To date our program 1=2 has resulted in 125 tons being collected from the Pacific beaches in Colombia. Of course this campaign is also part of our 1=2 program, meaning for every product we sell, we'll make sure that 2 kg of plastic waste is collected from the Pacific ocean.

If you want to know more about our program please see the below video and check out our website: http:// https://messyweekend.com/pages/clean-the-ocean  

 

What did our previous backers say? <3

 

The team

Presenting us - the MW team - at your service. As you see, it's us in the videos as well. No actors (obviously...). Just us. 

Back in February 2018, we launched MessyWeekend sunglasses with the help from almost 1000 amazing backers. To celebrate the campaign we went on a messy weekend in the snow. After breaking/loosing our veeeery expensive goggles from  *biiib*, *biiib* and *biiib*, we started planning the launch our FLOAT goggle. Thanks to the support and trust we received from our 4.634 backers, the campaign broke all records. Today we're selling our sunglasses and snow goggles, globally. However, even though the business is fantastic, we're still at a (financial) stage where we need support launching our next goggle adventure: the Inuit! And as we were born through crowdfunding, there's no other place to realize our dream, once again!

 

Product development & design process

After delivering the biggest snow goggle campaign to all our backers just in time for people's ski winter vacation 2019. We had a lot of positive feedback from our backers, but also suggestions for improvement. So in April 2019, we started the development of a new design with even better features and functions. In August 2019 we started to produce the molds for our customized design.

Meanwhile, we wanted to create one of the best lenses in the world and we believe we have! We have worked with one of the world's best lens factories and tested different additives in the lenses that would change the light spectre and enhance the contrast in snow and mountain conditions. We believe we have found the perfect recipe for our XE2 high contrast lenses so they are on par with the best ski goggle lenses in the world. Besides the newly developed high contrast lenses, we have added an extra layer of technology with the Photochromic XEp. MessyWeekend is one of the first in the world to combine Photochromic lenses with Revo-mirror coating and high contrast lenses specially designed for snow and mountain sports. We will offer this innovative combination of Revo-mirror coating and high contrast - specially developed for snow and mountain sports at only a fraction of the normal price. In addition to this for every product we sell, we secure the clean-up of 2kg of plastic waste in the Pacific Ocean. MessyWeekend is proud to be the first in the world to offer this combination!

This project is all about bringing high quality, great looking googles to the market at very affordable prices and at the same time honouring our plastic clean-up program. Our ambition is to gain market shares from the existing market leaders that are selling products with an immense gap between the cost and the consumer price. We therefore, believe we are benefitting both end-consumers and the environment.

Products has been produced and first batch are currently being shipped.

 

Risks and challenges

First of all, this being our 3'rd crowdfunding campaign, we know about most risks and mistakes made when manufacturing and shipping products to +70 countries.

Manufacturing: Our manufacturers produce snow goggles and lenses for 2 out of the global top 5 brands where quality and accountability is fundamental. We've developed a strong relationship with them, and they've been producing our Float goggle and XE1 lenses since launch. For us, functionality is #1. Our products have to look great, of course - but none of this matter, if you can't see sh** due to fog, for example. That's why we're constantly testing our goggles both in the lab as well as on the mountain to ensure that we deliver one of the best performing products in the market. As with all Kickstarter products, this means that small design changes can be made during the campaign, in order to 1) deliver the best performing product possible 2) keep the promised deadlines.

Delivery time:

Indiegogo has a 10 US business day payment verification from when you buy a perk. Once your payment is verified you'll receive a survey from CrowdOx where you choose products, shipping option and enter your shipping details. Once you have submitted your survey we'll do everything we can to pack and ship to you within 5 business days.   

We are working closely with our manufacturers to make sure production goes smoothly. We have already booked production slots so we should be able to ship all Early bird pledges in December. However, unplanned stuff can happen (like: a supplier misses deadlines due to missing tape, currier delivers to a wrong continent, or a customs officer had a bad burrito the night before...) Yes, stuff out of our control happens sometimes. But rest assured - the combination of our experience, professional manufacturers, and the fact we only use the very best global logistics partners the risk of delays is minimal. 

Duties and Taxes: Prices include VAT for EU customers (European Member States) and USA customers goods are shipped Delivery Duty Paid (DDP) and includes taxes and other services.. For non-EU and -non-US customers, additional costs may be incurred by your local Customs Authority. See FAQ for more info. Shipping: We have two shipping options: 1) Free standard delivery in 20-30 days. 2) Express 2-4 days delivery, which will be subject to an additional fee. The shipping option is to be selected in the survey sent after the campaign. In all cases where a package is returned to us due to: missing pick-up from access-point/post office, sent to a wrong address (due to incorrect survey information), missing payment for VAT, tax or other administration fees, we reserve the right to deduct all shipping costs from the pledged amount if a refund is requested.

story:
• Carry your stuff: A big back pocket is available to put a book, or a tablet. It is the same integrated bag that transforms into a back pocket !
                                      Everything we do is a MADE-TO-LAST  !

We use High quality and certified fabrics. We work with top quality brands such as YKK and 3M. We at Mova have high-quality standards.

Our jackets are 100% designed & made in Colombia, using high-quality fabric, providing you the best waterproof, reflective and long-lasting outfit! 

CAREFUL : These prices don't include the shipping taxes. They'll cost you in average 15% more.
story_txt:
family@movacyclingjacket.com


The integrated bag, it takes just 5 sec to put the jacket into the bag !  family@movacyclingjacket.com



Heidy Garcia, La Negra y Angélica Montealegre, Bogotá
Macey Sherman, London
Julie Plichon & Josh Chesterfield in Hampstead Heath, London
When we were doing prototypes ! We made some small changes since then. For exemple we only use the two triangles instead of the full MOVA ! 


 Comfort: the hood is compatible with the bike helmet

• Avoid the sweat: two opening pockets allow you to commute and move on your bike, breathe without sweating.
Comfort: The hood is hidden in the jacket's collar. Use it when you need it.
 Comfort: You will stop losing your keys thanks to this little pocket.
Comfort: The jacket is slightly longer at the back to prevent your trousers to get wet.
Be seen: The jacket is perfect to be seen by car drivers, night and day !

Carry your stuff: A big back pocket is available to put a book, or a tablet. It is the same integrated bag that transforms into a back pocket !

story:
MANTA : Removes lots of pet hair.

MANTA is a revolutionary product that removes pet hair from carpets and furniture.It’s easy to use -- you just lightly slide it across the surface that you want to clean, and it removes the pet hair.MANTA can pick up even hair that deeply-embedded that vacuum cleaners and adhesive tape can’t reach.

 

 

Product Features

  • MANTA removes lots of pet hair from carpets, sofa and car seats, etc.
  • You can easily throw away just the hair.
  • Pet hair does not stick to MANTA so no maintenance is needed.
  • No electricity or adhesive sheet is used so it is eco-friendly.
  • No running cost.
  • Durable for three years or even longer.
  • Makes cleaning fun!
  • Made in Japan.

You can remove pet hair on the belows !

 

What kinds of pet hair does MANTA work on?

MANTA works well on most types of dog, cat and even ferret hair. It does not work very well on thick, short (less than 2cm/0.8 inches) hairs, such as dalmatian and pug.

 

Things to know when using MANTA

In rare cases, the surface of MANTA may become slightly rough and not gather pet hair as well as it should. If this happens, use the included sandpaper to file down the rough spots.

There are times when static electricity may make pet hair stick to MANTA, during the winter for example. If this occurs, simply use a spray bottle to lightly mist the surface of MANTA with water before using.

 

What we need 

 The design for MANTA is basically finished, now we just have to get it into production. We need a certain number of orders in order to do this. It's a great product that will make cleaning much easier for pet owners, and we need your help to get MANTA into the hands of pet owners around the world.

 

Delivery estimate

We want to get MANTA to you as soon as we can, and the estimated delivery date is November 2011.

Notes

  • Please avoid direct sunlight. 

If you have questions, please contact indiegogo@realize-idea.com

MANTA works well on most types of dog, cat and even ferret hair. It does not work very well on thick, short (less than 2cm/0.8 inches) hairs, such as dalmatian and pug.
 
Things to know when using MANTA
In rare cases, the surface of MANTA may become slightly rough and not gather pet hair as well as it should. If this happens, use the included sandpaper to file down the rough spots.
There are times when static electricity may make pet hair stick to MANTA, during the winter for example. If this occurs, simply use a spray bottle to lightly mist the surface of MANTA with water before using.
 
What we need 
 The design for MANTA is basically finished, now we just have to get it into production. We need a certain number of orders in order to do this. It's a great product that will make cleaning much easier for pet owners, and we need your help to get MANTA into the hands of pet owners around the world.
 
Delivery estimate
We want to get MANTA to you as soon as we can, and the estimated delivery date is November 2011.
Notes

Please avoid direct sunlight. 

If you have questions, please contact indiegogo@realize-idea.com

story:
The Goal of Island Roller Longboards is to create a ultra premium and unique longboard from existing resources (wood water skis).

Local Craftsman and Master Woodworkers handcraft wooden water skis into beautiful longboards we call 'Island Rollers'. Each ski is strip down carefully to expose the raw wood. We then treat it with waterproofing agent and polish to protect it and bring out the natural beauty. We apply our simple graphics, Gullwing trucks, Abec bearings and premium wheels to make this the smoothest and by far the attention grabbingest board you will ever ride!

 They are great for anyone needing a mode of transportation, whether be across campus or down the street. Island Rollers naturally keep momentum more so than a tyipcal longboard because or the extra thickness of the deck and therefore require less pumping once moving along.

Island Rollers are different. They have a unique look. and they are 58" long - thats more than a foot longer than even the 'long' boards! And - because of the size - we have a lot of friends that use them for stand up paddling on sidewalks. As my friend Aravind described them: "I go on rides and in half an hour I will have touched my feet to the pavement 2, maybe 3 times tops. I cant always lug my SUP board to the water but with IR [Island Rollers] I can still get a good core workout while still being outside"

How will you use the funds?

Costs to produce each board are very high. At this moment, I make boards for myself, friends, family etc. because I enjoy it. I have only recently thought this to be an opportunity to start something so that I can share these with others. My goal is to use the money to do a run of 15 Island Rollers and use this inventory to jumpstart sales as well as to showcase the boards in a few of the local skate & surf shops in my area. The decks are the most expensive facet of producing these boards. It is not as cost effective to buy a ski and then pay a craftsman to strip it down and revitalize it. So in order to negotiate pricing, I need to do multiple decks. If I can drive this cost down, I can make the pricing competitive with the household brands but still offer a product that makes the mass produced boards seem like a piece of plywood with castor wheels on it! In addition to the decks, I need the initial infusion of cash to also purchase minimums from manufacturers for the trucks, bearings, wheels, hardware and graphics. I have been cashflowing these out of pocket for some time now so ANY outside funding is a great start!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Dwayne Jones, born and raised in California (USA) near the beach, but currently living in Maryland (USA). I am trying to raise funds to take a fact finding trip to the country of Ecuador to explore the capital city Quito, Cuenca & it's beautiful coast line located about 600 miles from the Galapagos Islands.  I am considering moving there, but I would like to get a taste before a commitment.  I would like to experience the culture, the food, & get to know the people of Ecuador. Help me to achieve this awesome goal!

What I Need & What You Get

My funding goal is $3000 and this will be used for transportation, lodging, food, excursions in country, and of few souvenirs for me and my gracious contributors. If I cannot reach my financial goal, unfortunately I will make up the difference with a credit card.

The Impact

I have lived in a couple different countries while serving my country in the US Air Force, such as Italy, & Korea and have loved every minute, now I hope to experience Ecuador and will let everyone know what that to is like.  Thanks.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would welcome any suggestions on specific hotels to stay, places to eat that are a must or sites to view.  Even, where not to go as well would be appreciated.

story:
Hello to all your Race fans, I'm Joey Licata Jr.


I'm aiming to make my mark in the NASCAR world. I have raced Karts from the time I was 9 years old with the ultimate goal to be one of the sports top drivers.


When I was 15, I started racing stock cars. That was the point I knew I was destined to race cars.


I ran the ASA Speed Truck Challenge in 2009 and won the points championship, and followed that up in 2010 with back to back Championships. I also raced NASCAR Late Models and NASCAR Grand American Modifieds. A full list of my wins are listed on my website.


Also in 2010 I was given the opportunity to test in an ARCA car for Cunningham Motorsports.

The test went so well I was offered to drive for them in the 2011 ARCA Racing Series.


In February I placed 6th in my 1st race at the Daytona International Speedway.


This all costs money!

Up until now my parents and family have help fund my way.

The series is continuing, but with out me. I have missed the last few months of races.

I need your help to continue my racing journey, till sponsors come on board.


The money raised here will go toward: entry fees, tires, travel, and payroll for the guys 

for the last 2 races of the season:

Kansas Speedway Oct 7

Toledo Speedway Oct 16


Spread the word from me. I'm even offering Perks!


I know I've got what it takes. I just need to get back in the race car and post some more wins!

 

Thank you for your support
Joey
