story:
Let's Ride!

Hello, world!  

My name is Steve Salois, and I am a motorcyclist.  I have been riding for 12 years and was dreaming about riding for 12 years before that. I love the secret joys of riding...the feel of a cold gas tank after a fill-up on a hot day, the smells of the land around me, the sight of the stars stretching overhead. I love riding, and I know that you do too!

To share my motorcycling passion, I have started a small motorcycle rental company that serves southern Maine and the White Mountain area of New Hampshire.

With your help, we will be starting out with late-model Suzuki V-Strom 650 motorcycles.  V-Strom's are great all-around motorcycles!  They are all-day comfortable and useful for just about any type of riding. Ours will come with side bags and optional motorcycle GPS. Rental safety gear will also be available. 

 

One great advantage to renting from Surf and Summit is that we bring the bikes to you! We will deliver any rental motorcycle within 50 miles of Portland, Maine or North Conway, New Hampshire. Flying into Portland? Surf and Summit can pick you up!  Surf and Summit has also recently entered into an agreement with Street Cycles of Falmouth, Maine. (streetcycles.com) Street Cycles is a fine Suzuki and BMW dealership, and you may now pick up your rental motorcycle there as well!

What We Need & What You Get

Surf and Summit Motorcycle needs $15,000 for: 

  • Our first two Suzuki V-Strom 650 rental motorcycles.
  • Rental Safety Gear
  • Surf and Summit already has the tow vehicle!

What you get:

  • Low early-adopter rental rates.
  • Awesome shirts.
  • The chance to ride our beautiful portion of the U.S. of A!

 

(This is the only one of my kids I could get to stand still!)

 

The Impact

Why do we ride?  Riding is how we breathe, how we communicate, how we congregate. Motorcycling is how we get away, or how we get together. It is in our blood, and in our bones.

Maine and New Hampshire are prime vacation destinations for thousands of people each year. For riders, a vacation without riding a motorcycle isn't really a vacation!  Unfortunately, up until now, renting a motorcycle in southern Maine or northern New Hampshire has been a limited experience.  The mission of Surf and Summit is to share our passion for motorcycling with everyone, by offering a great motorcycle rental experience!

 

More on the Rental Perks

If you elect to purchase one of the motorcycle rental perks, Surf and Summit will send you a link to the booking page within 24 hours.  On the booking page, you will be able to schedule your rental at no additional cost.  You may also add a GPS, helmet, jacket or gloves to your rental for $15 - $30 each (NOT per day!). You may combine multiple perks purchases into one booking, for instance; you could purchase a 3-day and 2-day rental, then book one continuous 5-day rental.  Please contact us if you have any questions!

 

Down the Road...

Surf and Summit Motorcycle has several long-term goals.  For the summer of 2017, we will have 4 rental motorcycles and the appropriate enclosed trailer to transport them.

For 2018 Surf and Summit would like to add 4 more bikes to the fleet, as well as guided tours of this great region, with lodging included! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Recently, I saw a great product on Indiegogo about guitar amps.  I don't play guitar, but it still looked like a really cool product, so I shared it all over my social media sites!

Even if you can't contribute at this time, please share this campaign with your motorcycling friends!  Especially that one that is coming to New England for vacation. There are easy share buttons right at the top of this page.

Thanks, everyone, and please ride safe!

story:
Long time friends Dave Clapper and Eric "Dutch" Van de Steeg have always shared a passion for camping and traveling. After their most recent travels abroad, they both realized there was something missing about traveling in the Southeast United States...it's too difficult! It can be easier to buy a flight and hotel and travel overseas than to travel a few hundred miles in the US.

Dutch and Dave decided to do something about it. 

In April, 2016 they formed Scampervan, LLC with the purpose of making travel easier through fully-loaded and stocked campers delivered right to your door. By October they bought the very first Scampervan, "SCAMPER1," built in America by the good folks at Recon Campers in Marina del Rey, CA. But you can't launch a top notch camper rental company with ONE vehicle though. 

This is where YOU come in.

We're looking for contributions to help purchase the next two vehicles so we can bring Scamper Van to the public in Spring 2017. Along with the money needed for the next two vehicles, the funds will be used to create awareness and passion for the brand!

We believe it's time for a travel revolution. Help us make it a reality!

Scamper Van isn't a product - It's an Experience 

Too busy to plan a weekend camping trip with the kids? Want to head on a mountain biking trip but don't have all the gear? Want to impress a new love with a night under the stars?

Scamper Van makes it super easy to leap into your next adventure. The Scamper comes stocked with whatever you request. Need a bike? A kayak or stand-up paddle board? How about an extra tent of hammock? Whatever your needs are - Scamper Van comes pre-loaded!

Finding the time to pick up the rental may be trying as well....NO WORRIES! We'll deliver it right to your door.

Scamper Van makes it easy to see the world in style.

HERE IS WHAT WE NEED:

We're looking to raise $75,000 so we can special order the next two vehicles, create the launch plan, and let Scampers like you know we're ready to rent by March of 2017, when camping season is in full swing!

AND HERE IS WHAT YOU GET:

With your contributions, Scamper Van is putting together a variety of perks for you to enjoy. From Scamper Van schwag and cool camping gear, to FREE rentals in our prototype and even a Music Festival Weekend with the founders of Scamper Van. 

YOUR HELP changes the way people in our area explore the Southeast and beyond.

No Scampers No Campers

The idea is solid, the support is there too, but we need YOU to make Scamper Van a reality. With YOUR HELP we can change the way people in the Southeast explore this great country of ours.

Can't Help Financially??  

That's okay - we understand that not everyone has a bucket of money laying around - but if you still love our idea and the passion behind it - SUPPORT US ANYWAY.  

Tell our story to friends, share our posts on social media, hand out our stickers.  Whatever it takes.  Support from you can look like many different things.  We just thank you for being interested in our dream.

story:
The Ultimate Dexterity Trainer

The Polar Dexterity Toy is manipulated with the fingers with of one or both hands to train dexterity, perform tricks or to simply pass the time.

Made of aerospace grade Titanium or solid Zirconium, Polar Dexterity Toy gives you a perfect feel and balance with the best materials.

Three options are available now: Solid Titanium (rainbow finish), Solid Zirconium (polished finished), Solid Titanium (polished finish).

The dumbbell shape designed for smoother flow and better trick potential. It slides perfectly between your fingers without any effort, even for a beginner.

Milled from a single piece of aerospace grade Titanium or solid zirconium. 

With a half the weight of the stainless steel, the Titanium Dexterity Toy features easy grip. A good trade-off for where you can use it all the time and still land all the tricks. Zirconium is slightly heavier for more advanced tricks and strength. 

It helps you train your finger dexterity passively, reduces anxiety and keeps your mind focused. 

The Polar Dexterity Toy is designed for fingers, it's easy to hold. It's very satisfying to let it dance between your fingers.

Solid Zirconium dexterity toy CNC milled from a single piece of solid Zirconium. Super cool!

Polar Dexterity Toy is made of solid Titanium or Zirconium, choose your favorite metal.

Why Titanium & Zirconium?

Titanium:

  • Used extensively in the aerospace industry 
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology 
  • The highest strength-to-density ratio of any element 
  • Resistance to corrosion: won’t tarnish 
  • Density: 4.506g/cm3

Zirconium: 

  • Used in jewelry and other decoration for centuries 
  • Resistance to corrosion: even higher than Titanium 
  •  Named from the Persian "zargun" or gold color 
  •  Common in cool stars and moon rocks 
  • Density: 6.52g/cm3

The Dexterity Toy is very small (0.78*2.36 inches) and portable. You can take it and show off or train your skills anytime and anywhere. 

Who is Polar Metals?

At Polar, we week to spice up your life with interesting and unusual metals in unexpected ways. We've specialized in Titanium and Copper so far, but we'd love to bring lesser known metals into the light like Zirconium and Tungsten. We are true metal lovers.

With your help, we've raised over $44,000 by crowdfunding unusual and interesting metal products. I love metals and I love the crowdfunding community. We have a perfect fulfillment record so far, and we intend to keep it that way!

What people are saying about Polar Metals:

“Excellent, excellent, frigging excellent ! ! ! Thanks for combining both campaigns !” -- kevin white (Bad Ass Carabiner) 

“Got mine..............Really Really..COOL....................” -- ET K (Bad Ass Carabiner) 

“Got mine in sunny Scotland and I’m liking it! Warms up really fast and is an excellent shape for self-induced massage. It gets into bits that other shapes find hard to reach. And it just looks nice.” -- Iain Drummond (Titanium Guasha Tool) 

“I’m so glad to see that your products have been so successful. This new new titanium Gua Sha aid is just what I’ve been looking for. I’ve been into the healing arts for well over 40 plus years, and many of your products have proven to be very affective to those I treat me to me as well. I’m and expert rock climber and martial artist and treat many others and myself as well. The benefits of your products are amazing. I hope you will continue to look into healing products… lol, Norman” -- Norman T Miyamoto (Titanium Guasha Tool) 

“I just got mine in the mail yesterday and it’s awesome!!! Writes sooo smooth! Thank you so much for making an awesome product!” -- Courtney McCullough (Polar Stone paper Note) 

“Carrying my Polar Note regularly. Laser-etched logo is very attractive. Appreciated getting a pen rather than the depicted pencil-that was a nice surprise. Thanks for the added gifts.” -- mpq2007 (Polar Stone paper Note) 

“Polar, personality I love your new carabiner. I appears to be super light weight and durable as ell. I can’t wait to get them and use them in my everyday events. I believe you have a winner here and wish you the best.” -- Norman T Miyamoto (Simple Clip Carabiner) 

“Got mine, seems like a solid enough piece. Thanks.” -- Jussi Paasio (1-Piece Carabiner) 

“Arrivati a Merate!! Fantastico e fatto in ottimo materiale!” -- Roberto Gerosa (Wallet Mirror) 

“Awesome!! High quality material!!” -- BRUNO SUDANO (Wallet Mirror) 

“I’m very impressed with the quality of this product! It’s very thin and doesn’t take up much space in my wallet.” -- devonc.merriman (Wallet Mirror)

Pledge now and help us bring this Solid Polar Dexterity Toy to life!

Density: 4.506g/cm3
Zirconium: 
Used in jewelry and other decoration for centuries 
Resistance to corrosion: even higher than Titanium 
 Named from the Persian "zargun" or gold color 
 Common in cool stars and moon rocks 
Density: 6.52g/cm3
The Dexterity Toy is very small (0.78*2.36 inches) and portable. You can take it and show off or train your skills anytime and anywhere. Who is Polar Metals?At Polar, we week to spice up your life with interesting and unusual metals in unexpected ways. We've specialized in Titanium and Copper so far, but we'd love to bring lesser known metals into the light like Zirconium and Tungsten. We are true metal lovers.With your help, we've raised over $44,000 by crowdfunding unusual and interesting metal products. I love metals and I love the crowdfunding community. We have a perfect fulfillment record so far, and we intend to keep it that way!What people are saying about Polar Metals:“Excellent, excellent, frigging excellent ! ! ! story:
Featured on


YDROP - Basically, it’s a spray-on product that you can spray on literally any surface to protect it from the elements. Contains breakthrough technology that protects surfaces with a superhydrophobic treatment that dramatically repels water, mud, ice and other liquids. This revolutionary new class of treatments causes liquids to form nearly perfect spheres, which shoot off the surface keeping items clean and dry. It also guards virtually any surface against corrosion and wear caused by exposure to moisture. 

So how does YDROP work? YDROP causes water droplets to form a contact angle of up to 165 degrees, more than three times the contact angle of an untreated surface. When a liquid hits an untreated surface, it pools on the surface, like a deflated ball, causing the item to become saturated.  When water, mud and ice contact a YDROP treated surface, the extreme contact angle causes the liquid to form nearly perfect spheres, like marbles of water. The spheres then glide off the surface, keeping the item clean and dry. 


The substance is colourless and odourless. It looks just like water, but apply it to any material and once dry, you can spill pretty much anything on it and just wipe it off with a cloth. You can see how it works with wine in the video below. 



Work on the substance is ongoing, and coatings have already been developed for:

  • Textiles, leather and suede (industrial and commercial)
  • Stones, concrete, bricks and plaster
  • Wood, paper and cardboard
  • Metal surfaces

There is some competition from waterproofing products for sportswear and creams and sprays for shoes, however these are paraffin based products which are very different from nanotechnology.

What distinguishes YDROP from competitors?

  • A completely transparent coating, invisible to the eye (unlike other substances).

  • It’s undetectable by touch and doesn't leave a crust.

  • It doesn't affect the permeability of surfaces, won't block pores and leaves surfaces breathable.

  • Maintains a high resistance to dirt.

  • The ability to ‘clean itself’. Drops of water simply roll off the surface of the material, collecting up any bits of dust or dirt.

  • Antibacterial properties. YDROP prevents the growth of harmful pathogens.

  • Protection against UV radiation, which prevents discolouration.

  • It is odourless, making it suitable for household cleaning.

  • The canister is not pressurised, making it safe to use.

  • It is biologically inert (non-reactive), biocompatible (interacts appropriately with a surface) and non-toxic.

story:
Short Summary


Hello, my name is John and my wife and I embarked on the journey of business ownership with our six children.  We bought Urbandale, a trap and skeet range that has been in northeast Ohio since 1953.  Gladly Urbandale is 100% open to the public, and we want to keep it that way.

Recently Urbandale has added a pistol range and a sporting clays course.  And we want to continue to add shooting disciplines to maximize our 65 acres.  A 40 lane 300 yard rifle range is the next step.

What We Need

We need $300,000 to do this correctly.  Here's why:

  • Excavation, we need to make sure we don't create a mud pit or have erosion over the years.
  • Concrete shooting platform and sidewalks down range to setup / retrieve targets.
  • Covered shooting area to continue shooting in any weather.
  • Landscaping, to ensure the cosmetics of the range stay above where you'd expect.
  • Any funds collected over our goal would go towards steel targets and stands


100% Guarantee

If we do not get enough funds raised to, 100% of the money collected will be paid by to contributors.


What you get

Here you get a wonderful opportunity to become a life member to the rifle range with no recurring cost.  Or discounts at trap, skeet, pistol range or sporting clays.

story:
“CreateTrips is a social trip planner for the smart traveller - soon with the largest library of mobile travel guides in the world.”


Change how you travel

Now you will get the largest library of mobile travel guides ‘TravelBooks’ in the world (available on spring 2015) with CreateTrips – the social trip planner for the smart traveller.

TravelBooks can be created by travel bloggers, travel related businesses and travellers like you. Hotels, such as Shangri-La, Hilton Hotels & Resorts and Fairmont are already creating their mobile guides to make your travel better!

Join the awesome community that has already created over 75K trips in the past 4 months: You can publish each of these trips as a TravelBook to make money for your future travels.

CreateTrips is currently available for iOS, but will be released for Android on late spring 2015.


How you can shape the future of travel

You have been sending us a lot of new ideas on how to develop the app. Together we can build the world’s best travel app by testing your ideas with other travellers alike.

How about unlimited travel inspiration, handpicked destination information, and unlimited worldwide offline maps with navigation for all of your trips next year with just one price?

You can help us by preordering the packages, spreading the word and leaving feedback after using the application. No effort is too small to count!


Why should I preorder a membership from CreateTrips?

1. Unlimited access to all published mobile travel guides 'TravelBooks' created by locals, travel bloggers and businesses - to help you explore the hotspots and hidden gems at your next destination!

2. Forget all data roaming costs and never be lost again by accessing unlimited offline maps!

3. Now you can have all of this with just one price for one year - by preordering unlimited travel inspiration for yourself and friends too!


Brief history of CreateTrips

  • January 2013: CreateTrips was founded in Helsinki, Finland
  • December 2013: First version launched in New Zealand, TOP10 on App Store in 5 days
  • May 2014: CreateTrips launched in the Middle East and Philippines, featured on App Store in all 9 countries
  • June 2014: Closed an early seed round of 600.000 USD
  • July 2014: CreateTrips launched globally, in the TOP10 of travel apps in over 75 countries
  • September 2014: +100K active users, growing with thousands of new users daily
  • October 2014: Over 200 TravelBook creators, including travel bloggers and travel related businesses


Now we are asking for your contribution to make this happen!

This is an exceptional opportunity for you to be a part of revolutionising the way trips are planned and made! Join us to make travel easier, click by click! This is a rare opportunity to preorder something unique for you and your friends!

story:
---------------------------------

Letter from the family

---------------------------------

Hello,

My name is Josh.  My family and I were just uprooted from a fire that destroyed everything of ours.  We lost all of our childrens' clothes, all our furniture, and all of our memories stored in pictures and videos.  All I am asking for is any kind of donations that can help us get back on our feet, and possibly into a new place, so our children aren't uprooted, and having to stay in a hotel for too long.  We aren't expecting to reach the goal number, we'd be happy with whatever can be contributed.  I appreciate what can be donated, so please let me thank you now.  

 

From the Bottom of my Heart,

Josh Nymon

 

 

------------------------

A CALL TO HELP

------------------------

My good friend Josh Nymon and his family endured a horrific tragedy on September 2, 2012. A fire totally consumed their house in Carlsbad, CA and everything inside it. Luckily everyone made it out unharmed, but they are in need of help.

To make matters worse, they were in the process of consolidating insurance to another provider, were uninsured for a couple weeks while waiting for their new coverage to start, and have no financial support. With this in mind, we are trying to band together to do what we can. Please donate whatever possible, whether it be clothes, household goods, or money, anything will help as they now have nothing. Please, if you can help in any way to get him, his wife Stephanie, his 2 twin five year old boys, and his three year old daughter, the basics in life to begin to rebuild their future.

Also, any guidance or information regarding any supportive programs out there would also be appreciated.

Thank you for your time and your charity.

-Bryan D. Shipp

----------------------------
WHAT YOU CAN DO
----------------------------


Donate Here:
http://www.indiegogo.com/nymon-family

Send clothing and household goods to:
The Nymon Family
170 Navajo St
San Marcos, CA 92078

Family clothing sizes:

Josh:
Pants: 38x34 or size 38 shorts
Shirts: XL-XXL
Shoes: 11 1/2-12 Mens

Steph:
Pants: size 9
Shirts/Tops: Med to Large
Shoes: 8 1/2-9

Chase:
Pants:12-14 boys
Shirts: M-L boys
Shoes: Size 3 boys

Chris:
Pants: 5-6 boys
Shirts: S boys
Shoes: Size 1 boys

Allison:
Pants: Size 4 toddlers
Shirts: Size 4 toddlers
Shoes: Size 10 toddlers

---------------------
CONTACT INFO
---------------------


To send support, prayers, and offer assistance/donations:
email: nymonfamily@gmail.com
telephone: 442 222-8586

Please like our Facebook information page to help spread the word: https://www.facebook.com/NymonFamilyFireRecoveryFund

Join the Facebook Assistance Discussion Group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/nymonfamilyfirerecoveryfund/

TribLive article: 

http://triblive.com/neighborhoods/yourmurrysville/2560541-87/nymon-family-fire-shipp-clothing-com-community-facebook-friends-murrysville#axzz26NJMTn00

-----------------
THE STORY
-----------------


News Video:
http://www.10news.com/video/31406835/index.html
News write-up:
http://www.10news.com/news/31406387/detail.html
Damge pictures:
http://www.10news.com/slideshow/news/31406725/d...

News Video:http://www.10news.com/video/31406835/index.htmlNews write-up:http://www.10news.com/news/31406387/detail.htmlDamge pictures:http://www.10news.com/slideshow/news/31406725/d...

story:
Imagine:
Instead of trying to explain people who you meet how to connect with you on Facebook, LinkedIn, follow you on Twitter, like some video on YouTube, how to reach you, what your website URL is, your phone number and more... just give them one URL: 
appearoo.com/yourname

Can you imagine how fast your networks will grow if you have your appearoo URL on all your profiles, your email signature, your powerpoint templates and so forth?

We finally eradicate business cards all together. Want to meet our CEO? Just go here: appearoo.com/axels - Can you imagine how fast your connections would grow? 

An amazing way to accelerate connection building.

You grow your network by making it easy and attractive to get to know you across all networks. Even people with almost no connection grow there network to several hundred follower in no time. And top connector or brands get their traffic to their social networks into the millions. One of the best lead building tools for professionals and brands.

How It Works


Main benefits

SCENARIO:
Lets assume you are introducing a new idea, product, or an event: To get the word out, you are posting on your blog, share the news on Twitter, you upload images to Pinterest, share a video on YouTube, respond to relevant questions on Quora, post updates on Facebook and LinkedIn groups, run events as Meetups and share the presentations on SlideShare - and more.

WITHOUT APPEAROO
Without appearoo you would either need to feature and promote all the sites simultaneously which is an enormous effort or settle with accidental visitors, who just happen to pass by. This problem causes many people to even reduce the number of networks they are engaged with - and as a consequence they also reduce their appearance and influence.

WITH APPEAROO
With appearoo you have all your profiles on one page. You share the page with a single link (appearoo.com/yourname) - wherever you are, whatever you do. By having your 'appearoo link' on your email signature, on your profiles, on your business card, your presentation and use it on every post or comment as a signature, you maximize your appearance - and with it your influence.

Mock up of the new design. Part of the funds will be used to make it happen - including the reporting engine and management system.


 How it works: Product & Influence



Facts & Figures

 1,7 Million users are already on appearoo. Now we want to take it all the way to the top - making it really cool - with your help.  


We help you identify your most relevant networks

General thinking is that LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter are most relevant - because they are the biggest. However, we learned from our own tool that this is not true. There is a variety of networks that are highly frequented and and very relevant. Now for the first time you can find out which networks are relevant for YOU. You will be surprised.

Influence starts by knowing what is of interest to those who you like to attract


600 social networks

We individually support little over 600 social network sites - so you can track the number of visits from the ones you are on and analyze how much time you may want to invest in those sites.



appearoo dashboard

From the dashboard inside appearoo you will learn quickly how much visits you are getting to your appearoo page and how many visits are initiated from here to your online profiles. This is still the old UI and will look much nicer after the redesign.


Gamification & Credits

very engaged appearoo users gain credits for their activities such as sharing a profile of another user to help them grow visibility, helping the community with product feedback and a whole slew of activities. 

Credits can then be used for product upgrades, special features but mostly for Buzz! an application from Society3 to run viral campaigns.

And if you don't have enough credits, you can simply buy them. And right now you get credits with every perk when you support our growth.  


Philosophy & Vision

=========================================================

More than a product...
Democratization Of Influence

As a business person you want more influence and attract more customers, as a scientist you want to gain more attention for your work and more influence on it's results, as an artist you want more people to recognize your art and more influence in how it is communicated, as a philanthropist you want more awareness for what you support and more influence in the importance of it, as an athlete you want to generate more awareness for your sport and more influence in its rules, and anybody who has a passion for something want to gain more influence and attract more like minded people. 
appearoo helps attract more people to what matters to you the most.
...democratization of influence.


Vision

We see a world where significantly more people gain influence and provide a much larger variety of insights and knowledge than ever before. We want to help scientists gain more attention for the research and inventions they make. Young musicians, artists and actors to raise their profile and gain attention outside the mainstream channels, we want to help young politicians to communicate new ways for better politics before they vanish away in an ever more complicated political network. We want young entrepreneurs to introduce their new technology to a large audience and we want philanthropists be able to raise more awareness for the work they are doing. It's great to see all those people already sharing a lot of great content - we see appearoo the part that raises the level of appearance for all the content across all networks.  


Your Impact

You can make a significant impact in two ways:

  • Co-Creation
    You will have massive influence in the product direction. As a co-creator you will be invited into a product design group on Facebook to discuss with our team and other co-creator users what you want and what you think we should do.
  • Democratization of influence
    We are building more than a product:  Together we can push democratization of influence much further. We can help everybody increase their visibility, help grow attention and influence. With more influential people, we reduce monopolies, manipulation and political propaganda - in the end we can make this world a better place to work and live.



Business Aspects

=========================================================

Our Business Model


Free appearoo

The basic functionality remains to be free. It includes your personal appearoo for unlimited profiles, the management console and a social address book where you can keep all the appearoos from your friends. You can follow others or be followed. Product support is provided via our user group.

Premium appearoo

The premium version is for professional use of appearoo.
Premium features include analytics, visibility in who visited your appearoo with ability to convert to leads. It includes also a unique messaging system to protect your email and let others still contact you. Premium also includes access to support team.

The premium version is $9.95/month – available Q1/2015




    How we use the funds:

    • Re-design the UX / UI for the current product. So far we focused on the value and functionality first. Now it's time to cross the chasm. This is a 3 month project and so we should have it completed by Mid February 2015.
    • We also want to build a more sophisticated 'influence engine' which will allow you to build 'circles of influence' around the topics that matter to you the most. When a whole group of people starts talking about a specific topic, you will be able to attract even more attention.
    • If we get more than $15,000 we will invest in a new analytics and reporting engine.  It will generate more sophisticated reports with drill down capabilities.
    • And if there is even more funding we will develop a mobile app for appearoo.
    • And then there is the improvement of our API in the list so that other developer can leverage our platform. 
    • In case we don't reach the entire goal we invest whatever we get to update the UI to the best of our abilities. 


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute with money - you can still help. Remember, we all have influence if we just unleash it. Please help spread the word. 

    • Please visit our buzz page  and share the initiative
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools - you gain influence as a referrer


    Want to contact us?

    We obviously appear on many online platforms
    http://appearoo.com/appearoo

    of course you can also just give us a call: (415) 656-8700  - No, there is no automated phone system - you get to a person right away - and he or she is not sitting in a call center :)

This problem causes many people to even reduce the number of networks they are engaged with - and as a consequence they also reduce their appearance and influence.

WITH APPEAROOWith appearoo you have all your profiles on one page. You share the page with a single link (appearoo.com/yourname) - wherever you are, whatever you do. By having your 'appearoo link' on your email signature, on your profiles, on your business card, your presentation and use it on every post or comment as a signature, you maximize your appearance - and with it your influence.
Mock up of the new design. Part of the funds will be used to make it happen - including the reporting engine and management system.
 How it works: Product & Influence


Facts & Figures 1,7 Million users are already on appearoo. Now we want to take it all the way to the top - making it really cool - with your help.  






We help you identify your most relevant networks

General thinking is that LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter are most relevant - because they are the biggest. However, we learned from our own tool that this is not true. There is a variety of networks that are highly frequented and and very relevant. Now for the first time you can find out which networks are relevant for YOU. You will be surprised.




Influence starts by knowing what is of interest to those who you like to attract


600 social networks
We individually support little over 600 social network sites - so you can track the number of visits from the ones you are on and analyze how much time you may want to invest in those sites.

appearoo dashboard


From the dashboard inside appearoo you will learn quickly how much visits you are getting to your appearoo page and how many visits are initiated from here to your online profiles. This is still the old UI and will look much nicer after the redesign.

Gamification & Credits
very engaged appearoo users gain credits for their activities such as sharing a profile of another user to help them grow visibility, helping the community with product feedback and a whole slew of activities. 
Credits can then be used for product upgrades, special features but mostly for Buzz! an application from Society3 to run viral campaigns.
And if you don't have enough credits, you can simply buy them. And right now you get credits with every perk when you support our growth.  

Philosophy & Vision
=========================================================
More than a product...Democratization Of Influence
As a business person you want more influence and attract more customers, as a scientist you want to gain more attention for your work and more influence on it's results, as an artist you want more people to recognize your art and more influence in how it is communicated, as a philanthropist you want more awareness for what you support and more influence in the importance of it, as an athlete you want to generate more awareness for your sport and more influence in its rules, and anybody who has a passion for something want to gain more influence and attract more like minded people. appearoo helps attract more people to what matters to you the most....democratization of influence.

Vision
We see a world where significantly more people gain influence and provide a much larger variety of insights and knowledge than ever before. We want to help scientists gain more attention for the research and inventions they make. Young musicians, artists and actors to raise their profile and gain attention outside the mainstream channels, we want to help young politicians to communicate new ways for better politics before they vanish away in an ever more complicated political network. We want young entrepreneurs to introduce their new technology to a large audience and we want philanthropists be able to raise more awareness for the work they are doing. It's great to see all those people already sharing a lot of great content - we see appearoo the part that raises the level of appearance for all the content across all networks.  


Your Impact
You can make a significant impact in two ways:


Co-CreationYou will have massive influence in the product direction. As a co-creator you will be invited into a product design group on Facebook to discuss with our team and other co-creator users what you want and what you think we should do.

Democratization of influenceWe are building more than a product:  Together we can push democratization of influence much further. We can help everybody increase their visibility, help grow attention and influence. With more influential people, we reduce monopolies, manipulation and political propaganda - in the end we can make this world a better place to work and live.



Business Aspects
=========================================================


Our Business Model


Free appearoo
The basic functionality remains to be free. It includes your personal appearoo for unlimited profiles, the management console and a social address book where you can keep all the appearoos from your friends. You can follow others or be followed. Product support is provided via our user group.
Premium appearoo
The premium version is for professional use of appearoo.Premium features include analytics, visibility in who visited your appearoo with ability to convert to leads. It includes also a unique messaging system to protect your email and let others still contact you. Premium also includes access to support team.



The premium version is $9.95/month – available Q1/2015










How we use the funds:

Re-design the UX / UI for the current product. So far we focused on the value and functionality first. Now it's time to cross the chasm. This is a 3 month project and so we should have it completed by Mid February 2015.

We also want to build a more sophisticated 'influence engine' which will allow you to build 'circles of influence' around the topics that matter to you the most. When a whole group of people starts talking about a specific topic, you will be able to attract even more attention.
If we get more than $15,000 we will invest in a new analytics and reporting engine.  It will generate more sophisticated reports with drill down capabilities.
And if there is even more funding we will develop a mobile app for appearoo.
And then there is the improvement of our API in the list so that other developer can leverage our platform. 
In case we don't reach the entire goal we invest whatever we get to update the UI to the best of our abilities. 




  Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute with money - you can still help. Remember, we all have influence if we just unleash it. Please help spread the word.  
Please visit our buzz page  and share the initiative
Use the Indiegogo share tools - you gain influence as a referrer



Want to contact us?
We obviously appear on many online platforms http://appearoo.com/appearoo
of course you can also just give us a call: (415) 656-8700  - No, there is no automated phone system - you get to a person right away - and he or she is not sitting in a call center :)

story:
In March 2014, I am excited to say that I will be part of a team of people travelling to Delhi, India. While we are there, we will be working alongside Pradep & Jyoti, who are a couple that run a refuge and rehab centre called 'Jyoti Homes' where they have 14 children - from the age of 3 - that they have rescued from the human trafficking. We will also be feeding the poor in one of Delhi's many slums and we will be teaching in local churches and bible schools.

I will need all of you guys wonderful support wherever that is finically or through prayer

I will keep everyone updated with how the preparation for the trip is going and how the trip itself goes through numerous videos, photos and blogs through my blog website. The aim of the crowdfund is to help me get to India and to let everyone know that I will be documenting everything through my Blog website, I will also be sending photos and videos of my experiences to backers that wont be available on the website.

Thanks everyone !

Paul

story:
A + S

There is a music festival on a tiny island in Croatia that happens to be the week following our wedding. Not shockingly, we want to go! In response to requests from family we are posting this campaign to raise funds for our honeymoon in lieu of a gift registry :) The trip will be 2 weeks in Croatia and Turkey. If we raise more than the cost of the trip, the surplus will be donated to cancer research and a bottle of wine (the wine especially is in memory of Anne Mills). When we said "no gifts" on the invite we really meant it. No amount is expected and no amount is too small.

More about our trip...

On June 16, we'll be flying from Chicago to the town of Split, Croatia for a couple of days then take a ferry over to the island Hvar. We're staying there for about 5 days, going to the For music festival and learning all we can about Croatian culture before going to Istanbul ;) We cannot guarantee an itinerary beyond this point.

The Impact

Couples that travel well together, stay together.

How It Works

Contributions made here can be done in any amount you wish via credit card or a PayPal account - choose "pay as guest". We receive the funds via PayPal at the end of the campaign. For more information on PayPal and to set up an account, go to www.paypal.com (choose the "buy" tab). 

Other Ways You Can Help

Make us a playlist! For the plane, the airport layover, yoga, waking up on the other side of the world...

story:
Help Build a Park!

Why should you donate? To help calgary get it's first public Bike Park! Bike Parks Calgary is a non-profit organization helping to develop and maintain fun, safe, and accessible environments for mountain biking for all members of the community. Fostering a future for mountain biking while uniting the diverse biking communities and promoting an active lifestyle through sport, we recognized the need for a free access bike park years ago! Bike Parks Calgary has been working with the City of Calgary to make this happen.Currently, we are in the process of raising the necessary funds that will allow us to begin building our first bike skills park. Big thanks to Parks Foundation, whose grant funding allowed us to move from the initial concept design phase to fundraising. Bike Parks Calgary's first park is located on eight acres of land, secured in central Calgary. The need to drive to other cities and provinces to access similar facilities is almost over! Feature article here in Metro Magazine.  


$5.00 Closer to a Free Calgary Bike Park

Our goal is to secure the needed funds for our project and break ground in 2015! Plans have been laid out, all that is missing is the funding and support to implement Phase 1 of the construction process. Although the entire park will cost approximately $950,000.00 to complete, we can build in phases as the funds become available. We are also working on corporate funding and grant sources to achieve our goal. Every dollar we receive goes toward the building of the park and every dollar helps!


The Impact

With a mix of many different cycling disciplines and skill levels being accommodated, the park will help riders of all ages and abilities grow. Creating bike parks can helps bring the community together, provide positive environments for growing and promote healthy lifestyles for people of all ages. It also creates a legal, equal access area to build and ride.   


Challenges

Our biggest challenge is gaining visible support from the cycling community and beyond.  We are always looking for help from those that are interested, to find donors, funding sources, and members to help bring this project to life. As funds become available, we will face many challenges in development, planning and maintaining our park. All of which we can overcome with commitment, passion and support!


Help in Many Ways! Let's Make Some Noise!

By becoming a member of Bike Parks Calgary and talking to others, you can help spread the word, engage interested parties, and show Calgary that the demand for this park is real! Remember to use Indiegogo share tool and tell everyone!

story:
(Traduction en Francais en bas de page)

Short Summary

My name is Claire Kern and I am photographer. I graduated from University of Newport in 2012 and have since been managing Third Floor Gallery. I became something of a ‘modern nomad’ recently, with a succession of moves and living quite minimally to accommodate such movement.
This year, I’m taking it a little further as I will be travelling around the United Kingdom on my bicycle. I am taking with me only the essentials: my camera, film and a lot of energy.

My photography is honest and captures the beauty I find around me. As a photographer, I walk in the shadows of Dorothea Lange, Robert Frank, Jack Kerouac, Mike Brodies, Stephen Shore and many others that have done road trips.


I started to photograph ‘Overlooked’ 2 years ago. I was travelling by car from Dover to Torquay and photographed all that caught my eye from the car window. In retrospect, I realise that travelling by car is too fast… With so much left of the UK to see, I do not wish to pass it by so quickly and risk missing out on so much of this beautiful country. So cycling it is!

I’d like to take you with me on my road trip of discovery…  

I’ve decided to share it with you through this postcard campaign.

The money that you will be donating will contribute to food, film and positive energy… but mainly food!

I am going to discover a new road…


How You Can Help

I have been working very hard to gather the core funds but any extra money will help in keeping myself hydrated and fed on the journey as well as enable me to buy any additional rolls of film needed.

There are 6 ways in which you can help financially:

£3 - A massive thank you on the blog and a lot of energy sent your way!

£5 - Receive a pack of three ‘Overlooked’ postcards

£10 - Three ‘Overlooked’ postcards with a personal message will be sent to you from the road

£25 - One 8x10in print of your choice from ‘Overlooked’ project + 1 postcard pack

£35 - One 16x12in print of your choice from ‘Overlooked’ project + 1 postcard pack

£50 - I will hand deliver the postcard pack to your door! (Wales, Ireland and Scotland only, please check the map to ensure that you are within 50 miles of the cycle route)

Any leftover funds, will contribute to materials needed to further the project upon my return; such as setting up an exhibition. You will be kept informed of the progress of the project via the blog: www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com


What You're Buying Into

By taking part in this project and contributing, you’re becoming a part of a documentary project but also enabling me to accomplish a dream.

I’ve travelled many places and used many ways of transport: bus, car, train, plane and even by foot! But none of them give me the same satisfaction as cycling. It is the most gratifying mode of transport I could ever use. It is not too fast nor too slow. 

If you know me, you’ll know I’m not the sportiest person in the world! But I am doing it! 3 months, over 3000 km and the will to move mountains!

For the last 3 months I have been training every single day using an old bike that was donated to me. I had much help from my trainer, Elza whose ability to get those negative thoughts out of your life never ceases to amaze me (if you need someone to train you and help you, I’ll put you in touch with her).


Risks & Challenges

I am very aware that my main risk is the road. I’ve been cycling in the UK since 2003 and I know first-hand what the dangers may be. After suffering from a few accidents, with minor physical injuries, safety is my priority. I want to finish my route and see this project through! 

The second main risk comes from the bike itself. I have been learning everything there is to know about fixing a bike on the road and I have to say that my bike has no more secrets for me. On this trip, he is my partner and my best friend! 

And the final one is physical ability. From a lot of forums and professional cyclists, I’ve heard that I would train on the way. However, I wanted to make sure I was leaving with enough training under my belt. So, I am already training every day and I have done many 1- to 2-day mini-trips to see how we (my stallion and I) coped. I can assure you that we are doing fine! Road, here we come!


Other Ways You Can Help

I do not expect everyone to want postcards, prints or a visit… But I would be grateful if you could share this in case some of your friends would enjoy a postcard from the roads of Wales, Ireland or Scotland! 

Or maybe you can simply help me find a shower and a bed for a night… 

Please share it and give me your thoughts! 

I will be keeping a blog (www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com) on the road, not only of the trip but also thoughts on photography and life in general during those long days on my own! 

Thank you for reading this and I send you all the Power and Energy I can spare for now!


Résumé

Je m’appelle Claire Kern et suis photographe. J’ai obtenu mon diplôme de Photographie Documentaire de l’Université de Newport en 2012 et m’occupe de la gestion de la galerie Third Floor Gallery depuis. Récemment, je me suis trouvée être une espèce de “nomade moderne” dû à des déménagements très fréquents et j’ai dû adapter ma façon de vivre et mes possessions afin d’effectuer tous ces mouvements.

Cette année, j’ai décidé d’aller plus loin en voyageant dans le Royaume Uni a vélo. Je ne prendrai avec moi que les essentiels: c'est-à-dire ma caméra, du film, et beaucoup d'énergie.

Ma photographie est simple et honnête; je m’efforce de capturer la beauté qui m’entoure. En tant que photographe, je m’inscris dans la lignée d’artistes ayant réalisé des roads trips tels que Dorothea Lange, Robert Frank, Jack Kerouac, Mike Brodies, Stephen Shore et beaucoup d’autres.

J’ai commencé a photographier ‘Overlooked’ (NDLR: laissé passer/négligé) il y a 2 ans. Je voyageais en voiture de Douvre a Torquay en photographiant tout ce que je trouvais marquant par la fenêtre de la voiture. Je me rends compte maintenant que voyager en voiture est trop rapide. Avec tout ce qui me reste a découvrir du Royaume Uni, je ne souhaite pas prendre le risque de passer a côté de ce beau pays. Alors, c’est a bicyclette que je voyagerai.


J’aimerai vous emmener avec moi sur cette aventure et ai décidé de la partager par le biais de ce projet de cartes postales.

L’argent de vos donations contribuera a l’achat de nourriture, de film, et d'énergie positive… mais surtout de nourriture!


Je vais découvrir un nouveau chemin…


Comment vous pouvez aider

J’ai travaillé dur afin de réunir la majorité des finances dont j’aurai besoin durant le voyage. Cependant, l’argent en plus me permettra de rester plus hydratée, mieux nourrie ainsi que d’acheter du film en plus!


Il y a 6 façons de contribuer:

£3 - Un grand merci sur le blog et beaucoup d'énergie positive!

£5 - Recevez un paquet de trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’

£10 - Recevez trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’ avec un petit mot, qui vous seront envoyées depuis la route!

£25 - Une photographie 8x10in du projet ‘Overlooked’ au choix + 1 paquet de cartes postales

£35 - Une photographie 16x12in du projet ‘Overlooked’ au choix + 1 paquet de cartes postales

£50 - Je livrerai moi-même un paquet de trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’ chez vous (Pays de Galles, Irelande et Écosse uniquement, veuillez vous assurer d'être à moins de 50 miles d'écart de la route prévue)


Tout argent restant contribuera aux matériaux nécessaires à faire progresser le projet à mon retour, tel que monter une exposition. Vous serez maintenus informés des progrès du projet sur le blog:  www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com


Ce Que Vous Achetez

En contribuant à ce projet, vous formez parti du succès d’un projet documentaire mais aussi vous me permettez d’accomplir un rêve.

J’ai voyagé de part le monde en utilisant tous types de modes de transport; mais aucun aussi satisfaisant que le vélo. Il me permet d’aller à la bonne vitesse: ni trop rapide, ni trop lent.


Si vous me connaissez, vous saurez que je ne suis pas très sportive ! Mais, avec 3 mois et une volonté d’acier, je réaliserai mes 3000 km !

Pendant les trois derniers mois, je me suis entraînée en utilisant un vieux vélo qui m’a été donné. Ma coach Elza m’a énormément aidée à trouver l'énergie positive dont j’avais besoin (si vous avez besoin d’un coach, je peux vous mettre en contact) !


Risques et Difficultés

Je suis très consciente des dangers de la route, ayant été cycliste au Royaume Uni depuis 2003. Ma sécurité est ma priorité. Je souhaite finir ce projet!

Mon deuxième obstacle majeur vient du vélo. J’ai appris tout ce que je pouvais afin de réparer mon vélo en route. Mon vélo n’a plus de secrets pour moi, et sur ce voyage nous serons les meilleurs amis !

La dernière difficulté vient de ma capacité physique. Malgré les conseils de cyclistes professionnels préconisant que l’on s'entraîne en chemin ; j’ai souhaité me préparer un peu avant le départ. Je m’entraîne donc tous les jours et ai réalisé plusieurs voyages d’un ou deux jours afin de m’assurer que mon vélo et moi étions à la hauteur. Nous nous sentons prêts à relever le défi !


D’autres façons d’aider

Je ne m’attends pas à ce que tout le monde veuille des cartes, photographies ou une visite … Cependant, je vous serais très reconnaissante si vous pouviez partager cette page avec vos proches - peut-être apprécieraient-ils des cartes du Royaume Uni ?

Ou peut-être pourriez-vous m’aider à trouver un lit et une bonne douche pour une nuit…

Partagez le lien, et partagez avec moi vos idées !

Je posterai sur un blog durant le voyage (www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com), non seulement pour partager le voyage mais aussi mes pensées sur la photographie et la vie en générale durant ces longues journées seule sur la route.

Merci d’avoir lu, je vous envoie toutes les bonnes énergies que je peux dès à présent !

J’ai obtenu mon diplôme de Photographie Documentaire de l’Université de Newport en 2012 et m’occupe de la gestion de la galerie Third Floor Gallery depuis. Récemment, je me suis trouvée être une espèce de “nomade moderne” dû à des déménagements très fréquents et j’ai dû adapter ma façon de vivre et mes possessions afin d’effectuer tous ces mouvements.
Cette année, j’ai décidé d’aller plus loin en voyageant dans le Royaume Uni a vélo. Je ne prendrai avec moi que les essentiels: c'est-à-dire ma caméra, du film, et beaucoup d'énergie.
Ma photographie est simple et honnête; je m’efforce de capturer la beauté qui m’entoure. En tant que photographe, je m’inscris dans la lignée d’artistes ayant réalisé des roads trips tels que Dorothea Lange, Robert Frank, Jack Kerouac, Mike Brodies, Stephen Shore et beaucoup d’autres.
J’ai commencé a photographier ‘Overlooked’ (NDLR: laissé passer/négligé) il y a 2 ans. Je voyageais en voiture de Douvre a Torquay en photographiant tout ce que je trouvais marquant par la fenêtre de la voiture. Je me rends compte maintenant que voyager en voiture est trop rapide. Avec tout ce qui me reste a découvrir du Royaume Uni, je ne souhaite pas prendre le risque de passer a côté de ce beau pays. Alors, c’est a bicyclette que je voyagerai.
J’aimerai vous emmener avec moi sur cette aventure et ai décidé de la partager par le biais de ce projet de cartes postales.
L’argent de vos donations contribuera a l’achat de nourriture, de film, et d'énergie positive… mais surtout de nourriture!
Je vais découvrir un nouveau chemin…
Comment vous pouvez aider
J’ai travaillé dur afin de réunir la majorité des finances dont j’aurai besoin durant le voyage. Cependant, l’argent en plus me permettra de rester plus hydratée, mieux nourrie ainsi que d’acheter du film en plus!
Il y a 6 façons de contribuer:
£3 - Un grand merci sur le blog et beaucoup d'énergie positive!
£5 - Recevez un paquet de trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’ 
£10 - Recevez trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’ avec un petit mot, qui vous seront envoyées depuis la route!
£25 - Une photographie 8x10in du projet ‘Overlooked’ au choix + 1 paquet de cartes postales
£35 - Une photographie 16x12in du projet ‘Overlooked’ au choix + 1 paquet de cartes postales
£50 - Je livrerai moi-même un paquet de trois cartes postales ‘Overlooked’ chez vous (Pays de Galles, Irelande et Écosse uniquement, veuillez vous assurer d'être à moins de 50 miles d'écart de la route prévue)
Tout argent restant contribuera aux matériaux nécessaires à faire progresser le projet à mon retour, tel que monter une exposition. Vous serez maintenus informés des progrès du projet sur le blog:  www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com
Ce Que Vous Achetez
En contribuant à ce projet, vous formez parti du succès d’un projet documentaire mais aussi vous me permettez d’accomplir un rêve.
J’ai voyagé de part le monde en utilisant tous types de modes de transport; mais aucun aussi satisfaisant que le vélo. Il me permet d’aller à la bonne vitesse: ni trop rapide, ni trop lent.
Si vous me connaissez, vous saurez que je ne suis pas très sportive ! Mais, avec 3 mois et une volonté d’acier, je réaliserai mes 3000 km !
Pendant les trois derniers mois, je me suis entraînée en utilisant un vieux vélo qui m’a été donné. Ma coach Elza m’a énormément aidée à trouver l'énergie positive dont j’avais besoin (si vous avez besoin d’un coach, je peux vous mettre en contact) !
Risques et Difficultés
Je suis très consciente des dangers de la route, ayant été cycliste au Royaume Uni depuis 2003. Ma sécurité est ma priorité. Je souhaite finir ce projet!
Mon deuxième obstacle majeur vient du vélo. J’ai appris tout ce que je pouvais afin de réparer mon vélo en route. Mon vélo n’a plus de secrets pour moi, et sur ce voyage nous serons les meilleurs amis !
La dernière difficulté vient de ma capacité physique. Malgré les conseils de cyclistes professionnels préconisant que l’on s'entraîne en chemin ; j’ai souhaité me préparer un peu avant le départ. Je m’entraîne donc tous les jours et ai réalisé plusieurs voyages d’un ou deux jours afin de m’assurer que mon vélo et moi étions à la hauteur. Nous nous sentons prêts à relever le défi !
D’autres façons d’aider
Je ne m’attends pas à ce que tout le monde veuille des cartes, photographies ou une visite … Cependant, je vous serais très reconnaissante si vous pouviez partager cette page avec vos proches - peut-être apprécieraient-ils des cartes du Royaume Uni ?
Ou peut-être pourriez-vous m’aider à trouver un lit et une bonne douche pour une nuit…
Partagez le lien, et partagez avec moi vos idées !
Je posterai sur un blog durant le voyage (www.ckernsblog.wordpress.com), non seulement pour partager le voyage mais aussi mes pensées sur la photographie et la vie en générale durant ces longues journées seule sur la route.Merci d’avoir lu, je vous envoie toutes les bonnes énergies que je peux dès à présent !

story:
Meet the most functional laptop bag ever!

The Moose Designs laptop bag is a professionally made, stylish and innovatively designed bag for mobile entrepreneurs, creators and adventurous people. This laptop bag is not just a laptop bag, it is a mobile workstation that does much more than just carry a laptop. Patent-Pending.

It is all about lifestyle meeting workstyle in an on the go world.

 

 Sizes

Yes, read on and you will discover the difference between a pocket and a pocket on a Moose Designs laptop bag. Most of the laptop bags in market follow the same design rules as every other bag, with a big area for the laptop and some pockets inside and out for everything else. 

The Moose Designs decided to break the rules and go back to the drawing board to create a laptop bag for the world today that serves many purposes and goes beyond convention. Most of us with laptop bags need to carry so much more today and they need to be able to work on the move, often literally on the move. 

Public Opinion Video

We wanted to hear what random people think about our bag and the testimonies were awesome!

 

                                                          

Details In & Out

Patent-pending The Moose Designs bag will adapt to your everyday lifestyle with its cleverly located different types of pockets and stylish design.

USB Charging Port

The clear material of the cell phone pouch allows the phone to sit in the pocket, be seen and the touch screen can be operated without removing the phone from the bag. This innovative idea not only makes communication on the go super convenient but keeps your phone safely in view at all times while charging from the built-in USB port located right on top.

The mobile workstation laptop bag addresses one of the biggest challenges of frequent air travelers too. 

The bag has been sized to work perfectly, even in economy class, on fold up airline tables in the back of the seat in front of you. The wings of the bag provides the privacy, even in the middle seat and working at 39,000 feet becomes a pleasure.

In a nutshell, Moose Designs changed or have rather revolutionised laptop bags and how we all work in a mobile world. The Moose Designs Laptop bag becomes a mobile workstation thanks to its innovative, thoughtful and stylish details that are everywhere.

The innovative ideas have made this laptop bag a must have, the ingenious side pocket wings that, when opened and stood up, create a private workspace anywhere with over 15 pockets over all, touch screen phone pocket, lots of elastic straps in and out, built-in USB port, water-resistant zippers and fabrics, the list goes on with its functionalities.

This is the ideal laptop bag for airline use. With its foldaway wings that also have pockets the bag creates a small, private cubicle that makes working in cramped spaces, on long flights a breeze!

For anyone who lives on the road or in the air and needs their laptop and work tools with them this is the ultimate laptop bag to make life easier!

 

Black Color Option Details

Now you can choose between our original grey color and black color when you select a reward.

RFID

RFID tags are a pet hate of many people and millions of these small but vital things are lost every year. This innovative and stylish laptop bag has special pockets just for these that allow them to be stored and carried with ease and safety. Easy access to what is in the laptop bag without compromising security has been a top requirement in revolutionizing this bag and Moose Designs have done so without compromise.

Working on the move may have changed the way we work today but some things remain almost the same.

We still need access to keys and we carry other items that we need easy access to with us all the time. All the pockets on the mobile workstation laptop bag have been designed to hold the multitude of items we need for us to perform and live with easy access yet with remaining secure.

 

The Moose Designs bag gives you instant access to everything you need. 

The Mobile Workstation laptop bag hasn’t just increased the space that conventional laptop bags lack but it has optimised it and made as much of it as possible functional and more practical.

This laptop bag has all the strength and reliability that one would expect from any other laptop bag, however it has pockets that are more easily accessible and they are better laid out. Hidden, secured and useful pockets are everywhere! 

 

Stylish and Functional

The laptop is used within the bag and the bag becomes as useful as the machine inside. The bag looks stylish and not like any other laptop bag where practicality and versatility are matched by good, fashionable looks.

 

Stylish materials that looked amazing but were also strong had to be sourced and stitched to create almost composite materials. Lockable and waterproof zippers, water-resistant 600D fabric, the strap , for example is breathable mesh fabric to bring strength and fashion together.

The bag has multiple pockets and carry-spaces that have been ergonomically designed both for carrying what is needed on the go but also for easy accessibility when carrying or when in private mobile station mode.

 

Carrying Options

We added the flexible handle, back strap, adjustable metal D-ring & padded shoulder strap so you can hold and wear it in a multitude of ways.

 

How Do I Get One?

To pre-order The Moose Designs Laptop Bag, click the button below or go to the reward section (on top-right side of the page) and pick a reward that you like. After our campaign is over, you will receive a survey where you will enter your shipping address and select the size of your bag. Any questions? We would love to help, let us know.

 

How we got here. We took the work patterns and activities of mobile people and applied these to an entirely new concept of laptop bags to create what is now the mobile workstation laptop bag. The biggest change that had to be made was to increase the practicality of the laptop bag. We built over 7 prototypes and developed the design each time until we reached to this point. We are really happy with the final version after 5 months of testing and designing with the feedback of random people. This product is Patent-Pending.

To ensure quality and manufacturing time, we partnered with the sector's one of the most experienced manufacturers and suppliers. This bag probably has more pockets than any other laptop bag out there which means each pockets, every single details, border lines, zippers, hidden and un-hidden spaces must be sewn each by each by a skilled bag tailor. We are very confident with ourselves and our skilled manufacturing partners that we will full-fill the rewards on time with the best quality!

Endless Details

Who We Are

The Moose Designs Lab is created in 2014 by a team of inventors and designers. We extented our team with creative folks and listen to random people about their daily problems as our focus is, creating innovative products that help people simplify, organize and improve their lives. With the help of Kickstarter, we will serve to our community and continue bring into being more unique and useful products to share with you.

We can't wait to get this The Moose Designs Bag in your hands.

Thank you for your support!

story:
We are happy to present a new collaboration between two family owned American companies- Grim Workshop and Bear Minimum in their creation of a joint product line we would like to introduce as "Grim and Bear it".

We developed a new product line that compliments the Bear Bowl cook pot perfectly and also can be used as a stand-alone cooking system or even with other cooking pots. Both Grim Workshop and Bear Minimum have high standards when it comes to manufacturing and materials and are excited about these new products.  All the tools are made from hardened surgical stainless steel and are very sturdy especially when you see how small they are.  The flagship tools are...

1. Liddle: A lid that doubles as a cooking griddle. It comes with a detachable handle,  We call it the “Liddle".

2. Bare Bones Stove: A stove/pot stand you can use with twigs on an alcohol burner and other heat sources.  The “Bear Bones Stove” can function as a grill, a stove, and comes with a half dozen skewers for cooking vegetables and meats while you use the top side for other cooking necessities and disassembles to fit back on its' storage card that is the same size as a Baby Bear base plate.

3. Eat'n Card: A card with ten functions, including two spatulas, a large fork, a small spatula with a bottle, and can opener, a peeler, a cutting edge, and can be combined into forming two separate tongs for cooking.  That means no waste from plastic utensils and cutlery. 

4. Cut'n Board: A small and practical cutting board created from food safe composite materials, that works and stores with the whole set.

We already have designs for more items in the "Grim and Bear it” line and are excited to launch our future collaborations right here.  Your support in this project will help us branch out to more innovative products that will help you enjoy your outdoor adventures for years to come!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out!  Even if now is not a good time for you to contribute to this campaign we would love it if you could use the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign out to the world.

story:
PRODUCT AVAILABLE FOR SHIPPING!! 

 

 

 

 

News:

Get the Crowdfunding Price of 549€ (retail price is 700€) and Free EU shipping!

 

Yes, it's a trolley bag that you can use as high performance bike trailer.

 

The Bike Trolley use

The hook & unhooking operations are easy and fast, tool-less and practical, every component is being designed to allow you to quickly convert the trailer into trolley and vice versa! 

Aren't you stunned of how fast and easy is to switch from trolley to bike trailer?!? 

 

A trolley bag is the best choice to to take care of your belongings during your trips and adventures, easy to deploy and move around. You can bring it with you in your tent or up in your hotel room in a comfortable way. 

 

Fasten it to your favourite Mountain bike or beloved Race masterpiece as well as your sturdy Gravel bike!! No need of supports and racks, just the custom quick release that we provide.

A trailer does not overload the bike frame and the wheels. 

The one wheel design enhance drivability even in the narrow single tracks.

 

 

 

 

 

 

I'm a hungry bike traveller as well as a designer so I developed a luggage I could fill-in with all the stuff needed for my adventures!

I started developing my own first trailer and then figured out how this could have a positive and useful impact in the cycle world.

When the goal is to create the ultimate bike trailer in the market, time, technology and testing are everything. For months we designed, 3D printed and messed up with iron and fiberglass, until we came up with a fully functional model. It had steel inserts to fit the mechanical parts and welded metal to hack some bike parts to fit the trailer properly.

 The tools we used for prototyping went from mainly evocative simulations and rudimentary acted-out scenarios or improvised props to detailed mock-ups of the system, the environment and the staff.

Production technologies

 

 The best part of designing gear for touring is the fact that you need to travel. And cycle. So we got our bikes, we got our trailers, and we head up to the airport. Next flight was to Stockholm, Sweden. A wild scenario to check out how our hardcore prototype would react in real life.e are a bunch of lucky

10 days and 1300km were ahead us. We designed the perfect route to made a high-intensity test based on a medium-long distance bike trip. All the coordinations were adjusted to the smallest detail and we were ready to ride for more than 100km per day.

The testing was carried with one prototype and two bike trailers of competitors alongside, which lead us to fully evaluate the conceptual designs and make improvements.

Our Tester Team Mate Luca and the very first early prototype of the trailer

 All this has been possible thanks to the unconditional support of Cinelli, Goalzero, Heimplanet, EVOC and Loopwheel. They provided us not only with the equipment required for this adventure but also with professional tips to make it happen.

 

 

 

 

               

 

 

 Thank you to all of you backers supporting this project!!

A special thanks to Industrio Ventures, the Italian hardware startup accelerator that gave us the propeller and boost to make this project possible.

A huge thanks to Andrea Pugiotto and Ruggero Arena that made all these amazing photos and videos to document all the work done and present it in the best way possible!

Risks and challenges

The design and features are 100% definite, we have well established relations with supply chain Italian manufacturers and partners, all based in the North East of Italy close to us, so we definitely have control over who is going to produce and what. The major part of the development has already been completed, we will begin the pre-series manufacturing and testing thanks to the Indiegogo Indemand campaign.

We are supported by the Italian hardware startup accelerator Industrio Ventures, meaning that we get a steady support of specialists on new product and business development, industrialization and business administration.

We have the technical expertise to control the project management side as well as part of the assembling process. So there are no major or peculiar risks with reference to the design and engineering side. We might face short delays in the delivery of components however we will be doing our best to ensure a timely delivery of your Sentier Bike Trolley.

story:
Hello! Thank you so much for your interest in LiveWalk! Roberto and I began LiveWalk in October 2013 after an awesome road trip through the USA in which we took many walking tours. Roberto, an industrial engineer and MBA who thought history was terribly dull [!! my academic background is in history, and I couldn’t believe this – I was guilty of signing us up for 10+ walking tours!] was left mesmerized by the power a touch of storytelling had on making history come alive.

In Panama, we realized that we had both a rich history and fantastic storytellers but that the two camps remained largely isolated. In general, our history remained buried in the library. LiveWalk was born as an attempt to bridge the gap between these camps and make our history come alive for locals and travelers. Each LiveWalk tour reflects the work of local historians, writers, actors, theater directors, photographers, graphic designers, programmers and sound engineers.

We currently have four LiveWalks and downloads from over fifty countries. We have been recognized by Martes Financiero, TVN News, Macrofest, PTY.Life, and Cybertech Latin America among other organizations. We have won grants from Panama’s Secretariat for Science, Technology and Innovation (SENACYT) and the Embassy of Taiwan in Panama and have worked in collaboration with the Ministry of the Environment to create LiveWalks for two national parks. To-date one of our greatest achievements has been discovering how well students connect with LiveWalk. Our youngest (and perhaps our biggest!) fan is six years old!

With your help, we will be able to further LiveWalk’s mission of preserving and sharing Panama’s history by creating two new LiveWalks: Casco Antiguo, A Social History and, in collaboration with the formidable Panama Vieja Escuela (http://www.panamaviejaescuela.com), The Martyrs of the 9th of January. In addition, we will bring LiveWalk Challenge to several underfunded schools and will integrate a new crowdsourcing feature in the app. The funds raised will be used to cover: research, scriptwriting, acting, recording, sound editing, design and programming costs. If we do not reach our funding goals, we will still proceed with these goals using the funds as indicated above (albeit at a slower pace).

We’re really excited about our perks! When you contribute, you’ll be one of the first to have the two new LiveWalks in your hands. You’ll also have the opportunity to visit us at the studio, have a character named after you, or receive a limited edition photo by a local photographer among many other perks!

We would be most appreciative if you would help us spread the word about the campaign! Thank you very much for your support!

Elizabeth
Co-Founder, LiveWalkPTY
www.livewalkpty.com 

 

The photos of Roberto and me in Santa Ana are by the photographer, Eric Batista

story:
Help sponsor this expedition with a donation and let me take you virtually through every step of the way to the top!

Many people climbing Everest these days are not professional mountaineers but people paying huge amounts of money to be guided to the top. A few of these people succeed, many don't, and some tragically die on the mountain. Despite all of the craziness on this peak, this is still the highest point in the planet, and the ultimate goal for an alpinist like me who loves high altitude mountaineering! This is my life-long dream climb!

So many great mountaineers have made history on this peak! For me to experience this mountain, follow in the steps of these heroes of mine, challenge myself at these extreme altitudes and try to accomplish this...Climbing the highest peak in the world! is the kind of goal that gives huge meaning to my life! And it's the most classic challenge for an alpinist like me.
Ironically, the costs of climbing this peak have sky-rocketed so much that it is now almost impossible for a professional mountaineer like me to climb Everest!

 As a guide I love helping people reach high summits, accomplish great goals, feel better about life and themselves. I truly love my job. Like my clients though, I also like accomplishing great personal goals and Everest is the ultimate goal for me.
You can help make this other wise impossible dream, come true!

Make a donation and your donation, large or small, can make the difference between this happening or not! and you can participate virtually every step of the way to the top of the world!

I have my own money, but I need 400 euro more. The slogan of my expedition is Make it happen!
I hope that by accomplishing this great challenge I can help inspire you and others to think of their greatest dream and Make it happen!
