story:
Meet the backpacking hammock tent that gives you a flat position and "flex space" that other hammocks can't.  The Flex-360 offers a patented new design that allows you to bring a friend or store gear in a side-by side hammock with nothing pressing against you. Turn to an extreme diagonal position. It's so adjustable that your heels can be level with -- or even lower  than -- your knees.  You can even go to ground if necessary!

 

 

How Flat Can You Sleep in the Flex-360?

Answer? Really flat.

 

More details about how to adjust your flatness in this video:

 

 

     

     

    Extras

     

    Vertex Rain Tarp

     

    The 16 oz. (453 g) Vertex sil-nylon rain tarp (optional) includes catenary curves to shed wind and high quality tie-out cords.  The 10 foot (3 m) width allows for some awning, making your hammock a comfortable place to pass the time on those soggy days.  The tarp includes velcro closures that hold your tie-out cords so they don't get tangled when you pack up.  The tarp also includes handy connection points to hang a line for suspending gear or drying clothes under the ridge line of the tarp.  This US-sewn tarp usually sells for $129 by itself.

     

    Easy Sling Suspension

    The 6.7 oz (190g ) suspension system includes wide tree protection straps, the finest 16-thread Spectra-style slings and Timp-Hitch hooks pre-installed on the hammock.  You will get amazing adjustability between trees that are up to about 19 feet apart (5.7 m).  Videos and tutorials are on their way.  This system sells for $69 by itself.

     

    Z-Liner Insulation

    The Z-Liner underquilt includes the best synthetic insulation available: APEX Climashield.  More details about the Flex-360 insulation kit will be available in September.  

     

     

    Benefits of Backing us Today

    We hope our campaign will get the Flex-360 in front of backpackers far and wide. When you support us, we will be able to make these products more efficiently in our Salt Lake shop (where we make all of our products). Your support will show that companies can succeed if they listen to their customers. 

    Why back us now?  You get:

    • The best possible price on either the hammock alone, or a great bundle that includes everything you will need.
    • Good deals on extra accessories that will allow you to insulate for winter temperatures and go to ground when necessary.
    • The knowledge that you are supporting a great family business and American-made products!  We will respond with great customer service and support which will last for the life of your hammock.
    • We are hoping to introduce some stretch goals that will reward early backers with cool stuff and swag. 

     

     

    The Final Stages 

    As we put our finishing touches on the final prototype, we are working to make the hammock as comfortable as it can be.  This involves constant testing.  The results so far show that this is going to be something really special.  We don't anticipate any major challenges in production and fulfillment since this hammock is an evolution of other successful models.  We have been fulfilling orders of hammock products to customers worldwide since 1997.  It is always a challenge to manufacture a product that experts are proud to own.  We will meet that challenge! Prepare to have a lot of fun in your hammock.

     

    Why Back Us?

    We are the company who invented lightweight hammock tents, inspired by the wartime jungle hammocks.  Our shop has created the best backpacking and special forces hammocks since 1967.  Over five decades we have developed principles that make hammocks great.

    We believe in:

    • Open hammocks that don't tip.  This is your bed away from home.  Sit on the edge to get your shoes on.  Unzip the breathable cover to view the stars.  Make an open hammock with no netting over you.  Be free!
    • Using the best materials.  It took many years to develop the perfect bed material, the perfect netting, the perfect suspension sling.  We worked with insect laboratories, we worked with professionals, and we kept working until everything was just right.  That is why four Navy Seal Teams have chosen our hammocks, along with many other military special forces worldwide.  Expect quality to get you to the end of any trail.
    • Making everything ourselves in-house.  We want it to be perfect, so we prefer to be very hands-on.  It is an incredible experience to take a new product all the way to through the design process until we receive our first customer letter telling us how much they love it.  We've done that with dozens of products, and it never gets old.

     

    FAQ

     

    Why don't the occupants roll together like other so-called "double hammocks"?

    Like our other patented 2-person hammocks, each occupant is supported by their own suspension in their own bed area.  The angle of the V-shaped insert in the middle keeps you from knocking shoulders with the other occupant.  The beds are held apart with the "Flex-Rod" on the wide end of the hammock.   If you are going solo, and you just have a pack, you don't need to flex the hammock at all to be flat and comfortable between two trees, so you can leave the flex rod at home.

     

    How do you hang the hammock?

    The hammock comes with a fantastic, simple hanging system that includes tree protection staps and adjustable slings that hold over 2000 lbs.  It's quick and easy to attach the straps to two trees and hook the slings on the hitches that are pre-installed on the hammock. Then you can easily adjust the slings to your desired slack.  

     

    Is the hammock waterproof?

    The hammock is water repellent and breathable, but not waterproof.  We highly recommend the sil-nylon Vertex tarp that comes with our featured perk.

     

    Do I need three trees or just two?

    You only need two trees that are 12-18 feet apart (3.5-5.5 m).  

     

    What size people fit in the Flex-360?

    Weight:

    The main solo bed holds at least 700 lbs, but the size of the bed limits the capacity to 275 lbs (125 kg).  The secondary bed is big enough to fit an extra person or gear that is up to 175 lbs (80 kg).  For best comfort, the total weight of two occupants should not exceed 375 lbs (170 kg). 

    Height:

    Because of the diagonal angle, the main solo bed holds a person up to 6' 6" (1.98 m) tall.  The secondary bed  holds a person who is up to 6 feet tall (1.82 m). 

     

    How do I set up on the ground?

    The Flex-360 sets up nicely on the ground as a bivy that fits two people.  However, we recommend you purchase the optional ground kit (which comes with the Ultimate Bundle perk) if you plan to use it this way.  The ground kit includes a sealed footprint to protect the breathable bottom of the hammock.  The kit also includes three stakes. 

     

    How do I insulate the Flex-360?

    You can easily prepare the Flex-360 for even the harshest winter weather.  The optional insulation kit (which comes with our Ultimate Bundle perk) will keep you warm down to single digits Fahrenheit (at least -12 Celsius) if you use a sleeping bag meant for those temperatures.  The hammock has velcro sewn-in to receive our underquilt kit. 

    Prefer an air pad? You can easily place an air pad directly under your sleeping bag inside the tent.  Pads like the Big Agnes Q-Core pad tend to stay put because of the materials they use.  Sleeping bags made by companies like Big Agnes have a sleeve in the bottom for your pad to keep it perfectly secure.

story:
See how other people feel about TripPal

 

 

What's a good travel pillow?

 

The Ultimate Travel Pillow with Soft and All-rounded Neck Support 

 

 

Sick and tired of your soft memory foam travel pillow that barely does the job?  

  

 

Downsides of Old-School Travel Pillow

 

Poorly Engineered

 

 

Too Soft 

 

 

Hot and Irritating 

 

 

 

Why we designed the TripPal travel pillow 

 

First Travel Pillow Designed with Cervical Spondylosis in Mind

 

 

 

My name is Joshua, founder of TripPal, I'm a frequent traveller, and I suffer from cervical spondylosis - a type of arthritis in my neck. I'd been searching for the best travel pillow - one that could really support my neck since long haul flights are a nightmare.

Unfortunately, nothing I found worked well.

 

 

So, I decided to design a neck pillow for myself - a state-of-the-art travel pillow that HELPS YOU TO SLEEP JUST LIKE AT HOME while you're in the air, in a car, riding a train, or just on your lunch break.

 

The Design

360-degree solid neck support, sleep just like at home

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Youtube Review

 

 How to measure your neck's size 

  1. Get a string or measuring tape
  2. Wrap it around your neck and mark the joining end
  3. Note the length and refer to our size chart

 

 

The Process

 

 

About the team

story:
Short Summary

This year's IQA World Cup is in Myrtle Beach, SC and flights there from CA are remarkably expensive. So expensive that it's a real possibility that STONY DICROD may not be able to make it... without your help! If you want us to be able to attend WCVII so we can help bring the Cup to the West Coast for the first time with the Lost Boys or if you simply love us (or even if you hate us and want to try to beat us in the tournament), donate - you can get some awesome perks for doing so!

What We Need & What You Get

  • Flights to and from either Myrtle or one of the nearby airports will cost us around $400 each round-trip.
  • In order to help raise those funds, we're willing to do a LOT of crazy stuff to get y'all to donate! From drawing to singing to even kissing (Call the fangirls!), we're not afraid to get a little out of the box with this fundraiser.

The Impact

Last season, STONY helped lead the Lost Boys to a 5th place finish at the World Cup. In Steve's three years playing quidditch, he has won countless tournaments, been recognized as one of the best seekers in the sport, and given quidditch national attention on primetime television. In Tony's year and a half with the sport, he has already been recognized as one of the best keepers, won the SCQC Rookie of the Year and MVP awards, and been considered one of the best overall players to draft a team around. You'd be hard-pressed to find a duo that has put as much blood, sweat and tears into this sport, and this April, STONY has a real chance to finally use all they've learned to achieve their ultimate goal in quidditch - winning the World Cup. And with this year's Lost Boys team, heavily considered to be one of the favorites in the tournament, their odds are better than ever. By simply opening your wallets - and your hearts - you could be a big part of making their dream finally come true

Other Ways You Can Help

We totally understand if you can’t contribute financially, but that doesn’t mean you can’t still help! Share this page around with your friends!

story:
The SAS Compact Folding Tactical Survival Bow

  • The SAS Tactical Survival Bow is a compact folding bow designed in order to be compact enough to fit inside a backpack, powerful enough to do the job of a conventional bow and engineered to last.
  • The SAS Tactical Survival Bow is the worlds lightest and most powerful compact hunting bow and we are bringing it to the world.
  • The bow has been engineered making use of the finest materials available in order to ensure structural integrity, corrosion resistance in marine conditions, light weight design and most of all repeatable accuracy due to our attention to tolerancing during the design and manufacturing process.
  • The bow is available in 45#, 50# and 55# versions and all weigh in at a superlight 2.2lbs (1kg).
  • The bow is a full size 60" modern longbow and is capable of attaining speeds of up to 210 FPS for the 55# version.
  • When in folded storage mode the bow is only 537mm long and fits into most backpacks and assault packs. The bow is even capable of fitting inside most one-day packs, under the seat of your car, in your trunk or even snuggly on your back inside of the camo carry-case/quiver that comes with it.

Who are we?

Survival Archery Systems is a company dedicated to engineering survival equipment that will stand the test of time and the environment. The company is a spin-off from an engineering design and development company that has serviced the automotive and petrochemical industries and hold various sports patents across the globe.

SAS launched in the USA in October of 2015 and currently has outlets in the USA, Canada, South Africa and Europe. More distribution centres are planned in Australia, New Zealand and of course we are gearing up to have these in a number of retail sites as we extend our wholesale program through increased production at lower costs.

In order to expand quickly enough though SAS has decided to run an Indiegogo campaign to raise the necessary production volumes to get the lower pricing we need for all of this. That's why we are going to give you a never to be repeated deal on our bows.

But don't take our word for it. Check out what the following expert gear reviewers said about our bows. There are plenty more of these on the video tab on our website at www.survivalarcherysystems.com as well.

Twangnbang

Canadian Prepper

What We Need & What You Get

SAS want to increase current production levels in order to reduce production costs and expand our wholesale program.

In order to do this we would like to get up front orders which will allow us not only to fund this additional volume, but will also allow us to get some additional funds to grow.

As the business is already running, all of the campaign funds will go directly toward additional stock and there is therefore zero risk to you. You just get a great bow at a really great price for helping us out! Now that's a pretty sweet deal for both of us!

The Impact

SAS believe that this novel invention will change the archery industry somewhat in that customers will be able to transport their bows more easily and therefore be able to better enjoy their sport and we think that because of the portability we will see, as we have already, a whole lot more people taking up the sport.

The product will also allow for an increased ability of survivalists and hikers to acquire nourishment in the necessary situations.

This product is already selling well in the US, Canada, Europe, South Africa, etc and is being raved about by many gear reviewers on Youtube and there are more reviewers asking us all the time for product to do reviews.

For more information on the bow please visit www.survivalarcherysystems.com

Risks & Challenges

Luckily for you there are no risks for you. Although we have set a campaign target, you will get your bow irrespective of the funds raised as we are currently running with production and probably have the stock already. In fact, the less bows we sell on this campaign the sooner you will receive your bow as the sooner we can produce it if not produced already in our backup stock.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

If you like our product and wish to assist us please could you share this campaign far and wide.

We would really appreciate your help! Thank you!
story_txt:
The SAS Compact Folding Tactical Survival Bow
The SAS Tactical Survival Bow is a compact folding bow designed in order to be compact enough to fit inside a backpack, powerful enough to do the job of a conventional bow and engineered to last.
The SAS Tactical Survival Bow is the worlds lightest and most powerful compact hunting bow and we are bringing it to the world.
The bow has been engineered making use of the finest materials available in order to ensure structural integrity, corrosion resistance in marine conditions, light weight design and most of all repeatable accuracy due to our attention to tolerancing during the design and manufacturing process.
The bow is available in 45#, 50# and 55# versions and all weigh in at a superlight 2.2lbs (1kg).
The bow is a full size 60" modern longbow and is capable of attaining speeds of up to 210 FPS for the 55# version.
When in folded storage mode the bow is only 537mm long and fits into most backpacks and assault packs. The bow is even capable of fitting inside most one-day packs, under the seat of your car, in your trunk or even snuggly on your back inside of the camo carry-case/quiver that comes with it.
Who are we?Survival Archery Systems is a company dedicated to engineering survival equipment that will stand the test of time and the environment. The company is a spin-off from an engineering design and development company that has serviced the automotive and petrochemical industries and hold various sports patents across the globe.SAS launched in the USA in October of 2015 and currently has outlets in the USA, Canada, South Africa and Europe. More distribution centres are planned in Australia, New Zealand and of course we are gearing up to have these in a number of retail sites as we extend our wholesale program through increased production at lower costs.In order to expand quickly enough though SAS has decided to run an Indiegogo campaign to raise the necessary production volumes to get the lower pricing we need for all of this. story:
This is a guerrilla marketing campaign brought to you by the Marketing/Events/PR team

-------------

Though some of you may be familiar with “Ping-pong Diplomacy” between China and the US in the 1970’s, the game was actually invented by the British in the 1880’s and so-named because it’s an onomatopoeia of the game in action. 


None of that matters now.

Flash-forward over 130 years, and Ping-pong is being used for a different kind of diplomacy — in the basements of frat houses and the break rooms of startup offices. The game has taken on many forms and variations, but all are connected with several underlying, unifying themes — camaraderie, competition, love, and mortal combat.

This is exactly why:

INDIEGOGO NEEDS A PING-PONG TABLE.

We are a team of competitive, blacklining, headband-wearing, gentle superheroes who need an outlet for our excessive energy — besides arm wrestling and crossing Market Street on our bikes. 

In order to make this happen, we are turning to the crowd — our family, friends, neighbors, enemies, ourselves, and beyond. By contributing you can receive:

  • Perks — brought to you by Indiegogo team members and swag!
  • Satisfaction — however you want it.
  • Challenges — to games of pong, table tennis, flip cup, and impromptu meetings.
  • Hugs*

*We can’t guarantee literal hugs.

(The branded version of the table/paddles/balls is $2500 - if we get to the stretch goal, it will get branded!)

The Impact

You will have made an office of people (who dedicate their time to helping others make their dreams come true) very happy. This will be an impact felt daily. This will be an impact felt especially during Friday happy hours.

Are you an expert face-painter? Do you own a tandem bicycle? YOU COULD BE A PERK! If you’re interested, reach out to YAN!

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether or not you’d like to contribute and pick up amazing perks, there are other ways to pitch in!

  • Twitter — Click this: http://clicktotweet.com/82hXe
  • Facebook — Share the campaign with your friends!
  • Email — Send the link to this campaign to people you trust!
  • Instagram — Tag photos with hashtag #gogopong.
  • Pinterest — Create photo boards of ping-pong related pictures.
  • Myspace — Reactivate your Myspace.
  • Rooftops — Go onto a roof and yell about our campaign.


We really appreciate your support! You are hereby challenged to a game whenever you’re in San Francisco!  

 

 
 
 
PERKS ARE LIMITED -> GET THEM WHILE YOU CAN!

story:
Race Across Venezuela, 1300km of solidarity

Ride for You organizes in Novembre 2013 the first edition of the Race Across Venezuela *. 1300km of Caribbean coastline riding through the eastern coast charming scenery, the bustling capital Caracas and the 44 degrees of the desert of Coro, to finally arrive in Maracaibo through an impressive 8 km bridge above the namesake lake, during the celebrations for Our Virgin la Chinita.

The Italian-Venezuelan event promoter delegation will leave from Treviso, just in front of the historic Pinarello shop. Here, in collaboration with Nitro Producciones y Eventos, this adventure documentary will start shooting.

The ride will be divided into the following stages:

13-11-2013, Carúpano - Barcelona: 220km

14-11-2013, Barcelona - Caracas: 320km

15-11-2013, Caracas - Desert of Coro: 460km

16-11-2013, Desert of Coro - Maracaibo: 290km

To support our initiative you can write to: info@raceacrossvenezuela.com or follow us on http://facebook.com/RaceAcrossVenezuela  

For sponsorship the address is: info@rideforyou.org.

* Race Across Venezuela is a non-competitive race to collect funds to be donated to social projects in Venezuela.

http://raceacrossvenezuela.com/press

story:
WHO AM I?

My name's Sara & I'm a senior Photography major at the New Hampshire Institute of Art in Manchester, NH. For my Spring Break this semester, I plan on traveling to Scotland. As good as a vacation this may sound, I'm not there to vacation, I'm there to work! I plan on getting ahold of some family-owned businesses before I leave to see if they would let me photograph them. I plan on photographing them within their everyday surroundings.

 

WHERE'S THE MONEY GOING?

All the money raised is going straight to my traveling fees. This will help me travel around Scotland and meet with the families and/or any other people I meet along the way. Any extra money raised is going towards the finalization of my Senior Project. The show for that is May 19, 2013.

 

 

YOUR IMPACT AS A SUPPORTER:

It's finally the last semester of my senior year of college. I've been extremely motivated throughout the years and with your support, I can end my college photography career with a *BANG*! I plan on giving a few of the end-result books away to those who helped shape me. If you can contribute anything, I will be eternally grateful.

 

CAN'T DONATE? HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

It's completely fine if you can not donate. Spread the word! Make some noise! Post on Facebook, Email your family & friends, Tweet, Tag, Pin, etc. GET THE WORD OUT!

story:
About Me

My name is Ryan Fuller. I volunteer at Coast Hills Community Church as a high school Discipleship Group Leader, as well as a volunteer College Ministry Leader. Since I rededicated my life to Jesus Christ about a year and a half ago, I've done what I could to step up and show the redeeming love that God first showed me, to those around me. I'm blessed and grateful to be where I am, but I know that what gifts He gives us are to be used for His Kingdom. 

This trip is a Christmas party for some of the most impoverished people of Ecuador, and our goal is to serve and bring the Joy of the Lord to their hometown and to their lives. Since I was in high school, I felt that I had some small tugging on my heart for the people of South and Central America. I know that God will use this to not only affect those I interact with, but also to expand my understanding of who He is as well.

Through your donation, I will be able to fund my trip, which costs $2100 (~$800 flight cost, $1200 mission cost, $100 fundraising cost) with the majority going towards the purchase or gifts, food for the people we serve, in the 7 different locations we will be visiting, ministering to more than 10,000 people in the duration of the week. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Plain and simple: I need help. The Lord has provided in more ways than I can count, and I know this is just one more way for Him to show His glory. I trust that the money will be provided, but here is an opportunity for you to be a part of that, and help to spread the word and answer His calling for our lives. 

I took spanish in high school, and was nearly fluent by the time I graduated, but that was nearly 6 years ago! I love a challenge, and I have a heart for the Spanish-speaking world, so I feel as though I've learned what I have, and been through experiences that line up with this calling on my life. I don't know where the Lord will lead me, but I know that His plan is better than anything I could come up with on my own. 

If the financial goal of $2100 is not met, I will be taking the money out of my personal funds. I believe strongly in the impact of this trip, and I will be faithful either way. 

The Impact

Your generous contribution will go towards making an invaluable difference in the lives of those God touches by this trip. The people of the Zàmbiza Dump, and other locations like it surrounding Quito, are in need of encouragement, food, laughter, and the love of Jesus. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who don't have the resources to spare, no worries! However, I would be greatly appreciative if you could SHARE this on your Facebook so as to spread the word and help me to achieve my goal of $2100. Sharing is easy and takes no more than 10 seconds. Try it if you don't believe me! 

  • Thank you for your time, and I greatly appreciate you and your contributions!!

For any money recieved over the $2100, I will open an account to go towards my next missions trip (est. summer 2013).

story:
Hi 

We are a family living in the mountain indiginous reserves of Costa Rica. We are serving the poor as missionaries to the Cabecar people of the Chirripo region of Costa Rica. This zone we live in is the poorest region of Costa Rica.

TRANSPORTATION

The reserve is a vast expanse of roads and trails that lead to over 1000 villages only accessible by four wheeled drive vehicle. We are currenlty raising money for a reliable vehicle so we can get to the villages and offer our assistance. The vehicle we are looking for costs $10,000 US Dollars. 

FOOD PROGRAM AND OTHER OUTREACHES

We are planning medcial outreaches in the near future and have started our first building project a chapel that has over 70 person capacity.We also buy foods from local producers and share them with needy families. 

LIVING EXPENESES

We incur normal expeneses our own housing ,food and travel. 

Please help us reach the Cabecar peoples by funding this campaign.

 

Gregory

story:
Nicaragua

Hi! Im Laurel Hinshelwood a 16 year old junior in high school with a passion for helping people. Ever since I can remember the most genuine smile on my face always came from when I felt that I was making an impact on someone's life. I gained this love for helping from my trip to North of Africa in 2010 where I witnessed first hand the suffering some people endure and how different their life can be from my own. Ever since that trip I promised that one day I would help make an impact on peoples lives who were less fortunate than I am. When this wonderful opportunity to travel to Nicaragua with my peers to help the people living in poverty there came up, I just had to apply! 

I need your funding because although I have big dreams, I have a small wallet. Being a full time student athlete leaves very little time to have a job and my school requires that I myself pay for three fourth's of the trip. I am a very passionate person and I am determined to reach my goal to be able to take part in this experience.

I was one of the few people from my school to be chosen to go on this trip and your contributions would help make my dream a reality. By contributing you will be helping me pay for air fair and the basic living expenses for my time there.

Thank you for your time and I hope we can work together to improve the lives of others!

Laurel

story:
We are a new ecological movement founded by Marcos, Wiliam, Juan, and Dean. Four travelers that met last year in Mexico and teamed-up to explore the world together, seeking adventure and pure nature.

 Unfortunately, every time we found a new beautiful place we also found trash. 

 

So we decided to start cleaning and formed a community of people like us who also love the planet and care deeply about the environment. 

 

 

We have already collected 12,235 lbs (5,549 kgs) of trash from 4 countries in 3 continents with 377 volunteers!

We want to keep expanding our movement globally to clean the whole world and tackle the trash problem from all angles!

That's why we created a GREAT travel towel to raise money and to replace microfiber towels that suck.  

 

Our towels absorb 3 times more water, they dry in half the time than Microfiber towels, and they don't smell.

DID YOU KNOW?

  • Bamboo reduces global warming. A grove of bamboo absorbs 3-4 times more carbon dioxide than an equivalent stand of trees and releases 35% more oxygen. 
  • One acre of bamboo produces oxygen for 24 people to breathe for a year.
  • Bamboo requires 1/3 the amount of water to grow than is necessary for cotton and yields 10 times more fiber. 

 

THREE FACTS ABOUT MICROFIBER TOWELS

  • Microfiber is mainly made of polyester
  • Polyester takes up to 200 years to decompose and comes from petroleum and coal, two non-renewable resources that contribute to greenhouse gas emissions
  • When washed, microfiber releases microplastics that end up in the ocean and kill Plankton. Plankton is the main food source of the marine ecosystem and its population has dropped by 40% since 1950

     

     

 

OUR TEAM:

 

OUR CONTRIBUTORS:

story:
What is Adventure Pass?

Adventure Pass is a card for travellers.  With this pass, you’ll be able to walk into hundreds of sports rental shops in countries across the world and get free gear to go skiing, snowboarding, surfing, paddle boarding or mountain biking.  If your gap year is coming up, you’re looking to take a sabbatical or you just love making the most out of your travels, Adventure Pass is the card for you.

We are launching Adventure Pass in September 2017.  Right now, you have the opportunity to secure one of the very first Adventure Passes and get in on our incredible Indiegogo-only pricing. Plus, you’ll be helping us build an incredible network of adventures for people all across the globe.

Why get an Adventure Pass?

Ski in the Alps, Surf in Ecuador, Mountain Bike in New Zealand - with the Adventure Pass, no matter where you go, you’ll be able to do what you want to do.  Here's a few friends to explain:

Never Pay Baggage Fees - Sure, you can buy your own gear.  But oversize baggage fees can run up to £65 per flight.  And many airlines won’t even take them, so you get to pay to ship them on a separate flight.  On top of all that, you get the fun of lugging all of your gear around on your trip.

Or… you can get an Adventure Pass.

No Plans Required - Maybe you don’t like planning out your entire itinerary before your trip begins. No problem.  Just pull up our app and you’ll find all of the Adventure Pass partner shops in your area.

 Never Pass up an Adventure - When you’re traveling the world, every penny matters.  The worst feeling in the world is to fly halfway around the world, get five feet from one of the greatest adventures of your life and have to pass it up because you’re out of cash.  Trust us, all of us everyone at Adventure Pass has been there.  With this card, you can make the most out of your valuable time away - and you don’t have to worry about your budget.

As featured in:

How it Works

Using the Adventure Pass couldn’t be easier.

Step 1) Travel to exotic location

Step 2) Open the Adventure Pass app and find the nearest shop

Step 3) Show your Adventure Pass and ID at the shop

Step 4) Get gear.  Have the time of your life.

Your Adventure Pass is good for a full year and you’ll be able to rent gear for up to a week at a time at each location.  So take your time - there’s no rush to finish that ski trip and move on to mountain biking.

Why Get Adventure Pass Now?

Yes, you can wait until Adventure Pass goes live in September of next year.  But then you’ll miss out on this phenomenal Indiegogo-exclusive pricing.  

On top of that, as backer of this campaign, you’re one of the first people we’ll be listening to when we decide where to bring Adventure Pass next.  If there's a hidden spot you’ve been eyeing for your next trip, just let us know and we’ll do our best to make sure that there’s a board, bike or skis waiting for you.

 

Which Pass is Right for You?

The Premier Pass is the best deal.  It gives you free rentals of all of the Adventure Pass gear everywhere you go - surfboards, paddle boards, skis, snowboards and mountain bikes.  But if you prefer to stick to one climate, then check out the Blue, Green and Silver Passes.  Or, check out the Club Pass, which gets you 25% discounts on rentals at every shop in our network.

The Packages

You'll see on the right we have a number of Perks two of which are the following Packages

The Perks

In addition to the cards themselves as perks the two packages above include these excellent Traveler Specific Gifts:

A handmade leather Passport holder with a selection of inspiring quotes for you to choose from

It even has a handy place to put your new Adventure Pass

And because we want you out there in the elements, with all the activities you'll be able to do now you have an Adventure Pass, we've got a handy waterproof pouch to put hostel keys, phones, or wallets into:

Where Can I Use My Adventure Pass?

The short answer: all over the world.  We have already begun building our network of shops in the Alps, Australia, California & South America. With the success of this crowdfunding campaign, we’ll be able to show other shops how much love all of us have for adventure.  So this campaign is a critical step in building Adventure Pass.

We plan to always continue growing our network.  Here’s the map of where we plan to have Adventure Pass available at launch:   

Don’t see your favourite location on the map?  Just let us know.  We’ll do our best to add it to the list.  And as backer of this campaign, you’ll be one of the first people we turn to when we look for places to expand.  

The App

We have an app.  It works already and it’s awesome.  Wherever you go, just pull up the app and it will point you to the nearest shop that accepts Adventure Pass.   You can even book a rental right from the app.  Simple as that.

Giving Back

With an Adventure Pass, you’re not just giving yourself access to amazing adventures, you’re also making it possible for others to have the experiences of a lifetime.

For every ten people who sign up for premier passes, we’ll sponsor a child’s adventure with an outdoor leadership program with one of these amazing organisations.

 

How are going to spend the money?

 

 

Who Are You, Anyway?

I’m Nic Woodhams, the founder of Adventure Pass.  When I was in the British Army, I LOVED all of the adventurous travel.  So when I got out, I kept on travelling.  I’ve parasailed in Ecuador, surfed in Australia, snowboarded in the Rockies & Kite surfed in Zanzibar. Travel has truly changed my life and I want to do everything I can to help others discover the incredible world we live in.  The first project I created to that end was KitShare, a site that allows you to rent out your adventure gear to travellers from around the world.  Through that site, I built up a large number of contacts in rental shops around the world.  Now, it’s time for the next project.  With your support, we can make it happen.

.

The Team

I am blessed to have an amazing team to help me turn your Travels into Adventures:

 

Risks and Challenges

We have set ourselves a tight time scale to get the network live by the September 2017. Thankfully, our founder, Nic, has been working in the action sports gear industry for a long time now, so he already has a lot of inroads with these organisations.  The main trick will be getting enough people to sign up now so that we can show rental shops how much interest there is an how good this will be for their businesses.  That’s why your support now is so important.

At first, our main efforts will be centred on surfing, skiing, mountain biking, paddle boarding and snowboarding.   But with your help we will expand quickly to include KiteSurfing, Paragliding, Kayaking and one off adventures like zip-lining, bungee jumping and whitewater rafting amongst others.

FAQs

Where will I be able to hire?

As you saw in the map above, we have already identified a number of our favourite places around the world where we will have Adventure Pass partners.  But it won’t end there. the great thing about backing this campaign is we ask you "where do you want to hire?' We'll be surveying our backers as soon as the campaign finishes to find out where they want to go and what they want to do there but if we were to have a focus it would be the traditional backpacking regions of South America, Southeast Asia and Australasia.

What will I be able to hire?

You'll be able to hire all the essential equipment needed for that activity for example if you're going skiing you'll need skis, bindings, boots and helmet, surfing - a board, leash and wetsuit (if it's cold), Mountain Biking - Bike & Helmet. If you have any specific questions about gear please email: hello@adventure-pass.com

How does this compare to owning and bringing my own gear?

This is a great question, usually asked by those who love a particular sport. We want to make access to gear cheaper than owning it, so we worked out that if you were to fly with either a bike, surfboard or skis twice in a year you're likely to pay well over £200 in baggage fees and still have the hassle of moving that gear from the airport to your destination. By backing this campaign you'll save yourself this hassle and have unlimited rental for a whole year for only £250. You’ll get to focus on having adventures, not hauling them.

How does it compare to renting as and when I need to?

If you're travelling for an extending period of time, you will be inundated with amazing opportunities for adventures and experiences you simply don't want to miss out on. Recent statistics show you'll spend 35% of your whole trip's budget on these activities. Therefore, over a trip of six months, on a budget of £500 per month, you are likely spend over £1000. Our Premier Pass which covers all activities costs only £600 and if you back us early you'll have it for £450. So that's a 65% saving.  Plus, you’ll have the flexibility of being able to rent whenever and wherever you want.

Can you guarantee the quality of the equipment?

We are only partnering with shops that currently have a strong reputation for quality.  But with our app, you'll be able to rate each shop based on your experience of their service and the quality of their gear. This information will be crucial to us being able to offer a guaranteed level in the future.

What if there's not a partner shop where I am going?

Though we hope you'll always use our app to find a partner shop wherever you are as we grow the network there may be odd occasions where we haven't found a partner. However, as long as we have a week’s notice, we are confident we can bring a partner on board. In the unlikely event that we can't, we will cover the rental cost at whatever hire shop you've found yourself.

How often can I hire gear?

You’ll be able to rent gear for up to a week at a time at each location. You can hire as many times as you like within a 365-day period from buying your pass. As the network is not yet live, if you back the campaign, day one of your 365 days of free rental will begin when you tell us, so no wasted time.

Do you cover insurance?

We do not cover insurance, but it is one of the facilities we would like to offer to complement buying the pass in the future. Until then, it is up to pass holders to ensure that have adequate insurance to cover the activity they are participating in. 

Do you cover lift fees or other costs to entry?

Our focus is purely on the equipment you need for the activity you are participating in. We do not cover resort specific entrance fees or lift passes but it is one of the areas we look to expand our offer to in the future.

I want to give a pass as a Christmas present, can you help?

The estimated card delivery date is September 2017. However, we know what an amazing Christmas present any of our passes and packages could be. Therefore providing we hit our target and you let us know no later than 7 December, we will try our best to have something to you in time for Christmas.

Adventure Pass is a card for travellers.  With this pass, you’ll be able to walk into hundreds of sports rental shops in countries across the world and get free gear to go skiing, snowboarding, surfing, paddle boarding or mountain biking.  If your gap year is coming up, you’re looking to take a sabbatical or you just love making the most out of your travels, Adventure Pass is the card for you.

We are launching Adventure Pass in September 2017.  Right now, you have the opportunity to secure one of the very first Adventure Passes and get in on our incredible Indiegogo-only pricing. Plus, you’ll be helping us build an incredible network of adventures for people all across the globe.

story:
Futo Mattress is a comfortable Twin XL size mattress with the headrest that will be needy for any occasion when you would like to take a rest or even a nap. We’ve researched and tested a number of forms and textiles in order to create the perfect mattress that you will love to rest on!

 

 You can call it innovation but we call it a revolution! A Monoflow technology allows to blow Futo Mattress up with few simple movements.

 

All you need to do is simply open the Futo Mattress and catch the air around you, (it inflows to four tubes evenly). 

 

Futo Mattress is made from two state-of-the-art materials. The outer layer is made of high-quality Ripstop material using a special reinforcing technique that makes it resistant to tearing and ripping. Similar textile can be found in hot air balloons and high-quality camping hammocks.

The inner layer is made of thick polyethylene that holds the air inside and provides extra protection.

It is ecologically friendly. It’s water and heat resistant, provides comfort against a rocky or uneven ground, and maintains its strength and durability in even the lowest temperatures!

 

Many researchers have proven that a short nap during the day provides significant benefits, including improved alertness and performance. All you need is... well, a comfortable place to lie down. You know what we mean? 

 

 

Futo Pillow is the most universal air pillow! It’s ultra portable (size of the sunglasses case), inflates with one simple movement, comfortable and looking great! And yes, it works perfectly with Futo Mattress!

 

We all know that situation when there is no way to put your head during long plane, train or car trips. Those travel pillows are working well, but they are pretty big to carry and have only one user case. While Futo Pillow is made to be universal, you can use it outdoor, at home, office, you name it!

Futo Pillow is made out of soft microfiber fabric that is pleasant to the touch, durable, and easy to clean. We used the Monoflow technology from the Futo Mattress that allows to inflow two tubes of the Futo Pillow evenly.

 

And Something Special For You!

 

Meet Futo Connectors! Create your own Futo KING size Mattress! Simply stick 2, 3 or more mattresses to each other and have a fun with your friends wherever you go.

Our team designed 5 x loops from the each side of every Futo Mattress to get a strong connection between them. We decided to add 5 x Futo Connectors kit to every Double and Triple Pack absolutely for FREE. Hope you will like this new feature and enjoy it during every outdoor activity.  

* If you pledged for 1 x Futo Mattress and had in mind to purchase one more mattress in future, you could find Futo Connectors kit in our website store after the end of campaign

 

 

 

 The video was made without editing to prove the ease of inflation. 

Each Futo comes with a cool backpack with two sleeves! Yeah!

There is no picture that will show how really comfortable it is. You just touch it and… the world stops. We are pretty sure you will love that feeling.

 

We’ve spent four months testing the textile, form, partitions, and of course, the Monoflow technology. We are currently able to produce a few hand-made Futo’s each day. Our team is looking for financial support to launch the real workshop producing Futo Mattresses on a larger scale. 

 

3..2..1..Final Production Phase have been started!

Futo Mattresses sewing is in full swing right now! We've been setting up this process for some time because we are perfectionists and have imposed stringent conditions to the manufacturer.

It is very important for us to make every customer fall in love with Futo products, so we asked to test mattresses for strength, durability and impermeability. Our team is always working on the principle of: "Imagine that you are the customer. What product would you like to get? "

Withstand test : 100kg on Futo Mattress

Below you will see some photos from the factory during production. As we said before, the pillows and remained part of the bags have already been sewn. By the end of the week, we will do a new update which intends to announce that production ended. Hopefully, our desire to coincide with the passage of all the circumstances :)

Bright Futo Pillows

Capacious pocket

 

Expected shipping month was January. But there might be extra production difficulties,Christmas holidays, Chinese New Year (if we will get 500+ orders, Futo`s production will be located in China). That's why March is more realistic shipping month.

story:
My name is Kenneth B. Edwards, Known on Instagram as @kennethbedwards or

 www.instagram.com/kennethbedwards 

I am heading to the West Coast in October for two weeks. My goal is to photograph as many Ballet Dancers as possible in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Portland, and Seattle.

I have set out to photograph Ballet Dancers, and through social media bring their stories and faces to those who may otherwise have been un-aware of their art, and the beautiful skills they have given their lives to cultivate. Give names, and individual personalities to the people we see on the stage. I believe that to know the artist you are watching, is to have a more personal connection to their performance. 

(Gigi Crouch)

Near the end of February I began shooting Ballet Dancers with a quick three day trip to Boston Ballet. Not long after returning to New York I began to travel to other cities shooting Professional Ballet Dancers wherever I went. In these few months I have shot nearly 120 dancers, and my instagram as gained more than 12k followers. And I have done all of this on my own dime. Not accepting payment from the professional Ballet Dancers I shoot.

(Katie Williams)

This is because, while photography is how I make my living. The integrity of these images, and most importantly my mission in making them is more important than that. They are in tribute, and for the sake of the art form, both mine, and that of the Dancers.

(Allyssa Bross)

at this point I should give a little back story:
I was raised a classical musician. Violin and Piano from the time I was 7, and Classical voice for as long as I can remember, even attending the Boston Conservatory of Music as a Vocal Major for a time. 


Get me to the West Coast, and you will be helping me shine a light on many more incredible Ballet Dancers, some of whom you haven't yet been introduced to. 

(Daphne Fernberger)

(Mimi Staker)

(Catherine Hurlin)

(Brittany Stone)

(Mimi Staker)

(Alec Knight)

(Cassie Trenary)

(Mikaela Kelly)

In these few months I have shot nearly 120 dancers, and my instagram as gained more than 12k followers. And I have done all of this on my own dime. Not accepting payment from the professional Ballet Dancers I shoot.(Katie Williams)This is because, while photography is how I make my living. The integrity of these images, and most importantly my mission in making them is more important than that. They are in tribute, and for the sake of the art form, both mine, and that of the Dancers.(Allyssa Bross)at this point I should give a little back story:I was raised a classical musician. Violin and Piano from the time I was 7, and Classical voice for as long as I can remember, even attending the Boston Conservatory of Music as a Vocal Major for a time. 
Get me to the West Coast, and you will be helping me shine a light on many more incredible Ballet Dancers, some of whom you haven't yet been introduced to. 

(Daphne Fernberger)


(Mimi Staker)


(Catherine Hurlin)


(Brittany Stone)

(Mimi Staker)


(Alec Knight)

(Cassie Trenary)


(Mikaela Kelly)

story:
No need for an outlet, an external battery pack keeps Rakin wireless and portable. There is no risk of electric shock, fire or harmful electromagnetic wave exposure. Capable of being powered by any 5V external battery (power bank), Rakin offers unparalleled heating efficiency. To ensure that consumers can use heat bedding more conveniently, compatibility should be assured with various products that are commercially marketed and very easily available. In this smart phone era, compatibility is important for products standardized with DC 5V (2.1A output), which are available anywhere. Rakin is a convenient and safe product compatible with any components such as a DC 5V(2.1A output) battery, auxiliary battery, power bank, power bank auxiliary battery, battery pack, energy storage devices(ESS), and portable DC power supplies, etc., which differs from device that work by plugging a power cord into an AC 110-220V in combination with bedding such as ordinary electric blanket/pad, etc. 

 

 

 

 

 

 


By using heat circulation technology, the thermal energy moves around in sequence, Top – Mid – Bottom of the blanket automatically by the smart algorithm. (Top-Bottom for medium size)

Existing technology of the current market (except for Radiance’s) requires 15V to generate heat this wide area instantly, and regular 5V USB battery packs would be no use. It means customers have to use special battery packs and there is no practicality and compatibility at all.

Only with Radiance’s patent technology; Heat Circulation, it has become possible to heat up a large area by a 5V portable power bank.

 

 

 

 

Rakin is slim and flexible, allowing regular machine washes that ensure a semi-permanent life span. Extremely durable with no risk of electric shock, you can fold or wrinkle Rakin for storage, and also spin dry with no worries.
Due to its convenience, a Rakin is a perfect choice for people who enjoy traveling or camping.  

 

 

 

Rakin comes in two sizes and five colors. The DWR Polyester Ripstop Premium goose-down materials has a high heat preservation. Rakin has 3 heat levels where each heating lasts for 9 hours on low heat setting(Green LED), 6 hours and 45 minutes on medium heating setting(Blue LED), and 4 hours and 30 minutes on high heat setting(Red LED). Rakin is very light(under 500g for large size) in nature, which makes it very easy to pack and carry around. The material is also water repellent and 100% washable. Rakin is the perfect companion for camping, hiking, and any other outdoor activities.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What is SFIM?


SFIM(SUHO Far-Infrared heating wire composite material), the core technology of Radiance, is a heat-generating new material and releases a special far-infrared ray. Far-infared ray is a new type of infrared radiation that NASA discovered. The typical effect of far-infrared ray generating a heat reaction after being absorbed into our bodies, is enlarging our capillaries, encouraging blood circulation and cellular tissue growth. Also, when the heat reaches the moisture and protein molecules that make up the cells, it shakes the cells 2,000 times per minute. This vitalizes the cellular tissues, helping to prevent aging, boost metabolism, increasing tissue regeneration, and preventing adult diseases such as chronic fatigue. Other benefits include pain reduction, removal of heavy metal particles, deodorization, mold-repelling, dehumidification, and air cleaning, making it useful as medical equipment, kitchen equipment, housing and building materials, textiles, bedding, etc. SFIM is the world's first far-infrared ray containing energy of universe.

 

 

 

 

What is far infrared ray?

Far-infrared rays are a new type of infrared radiation that NASA has discovered. Beginning from research to secure food resources inside a spaceship, far-infrared ray studies have developed mostly for medical purposes. It is an effective light that is regarded as an elixir of life, effective in treating cancer and preventing aging.

 

 

 

 

Conventional heating products’ far-infrared

vs Rakin’s far-infrared


Conventional heating/steaming and thermal equipment has weak or temporary far-infrared effects (weak penetration, short distance, etc.). The heat cannot reach over 1cm under the skin so that it has less therapeutic effect. Most heating/steaming and thermal equipment needs to be applied for at least 30 minutes to warm the muscle tissue by raising its temperature by 1 degree. Such a long exposure to heat may cause burns. The far-infrared heat of Rakin permeates deeply into muscle and bone tissues, perfectly achieving the far-infrared effect of the sun discovered by NASA. Rakin is the only product that can bring real therapeutic effects such as relaxation of muscle pain, improvements of blood circulation, and enhancement of the immune system.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rakin, by adopting a new advanced heating element alloy, has achieved precision, durability, ultra-fast heat generation, and the self-regulating ability to maintain temperature uniformly by the heat wire itself. Moreover, Rakin divides a large area to be heated into several circuits and controls them based on a circular heat generation algorithm to prevent any flow of excessive current to each part with high precision. Regarding these non-simple heating products and heat wires, Rakin developed by Radiance, represents the culmination of decades of scientific research and experiments. It removes concerns about harmful electromagnetic waves and fire/electric shock hazards. 
 

 

 

Rakin’s SUHO far infrared heat technology synergize to create certified antibacterial protection that even blocks allergens and dust mites.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Premium Goose down Insulation   
Stuffed with premium light-weight goose down, 
Rakin offers superior insulation and feather-soft to the touch.    

 

 

 

 

 

Only consumes 11W (DC 5V 2.2A)   
*Based on output 10,000mAh
*Batteries Not Included

 

 

 

To see more videos, please visit Radiance Youtube

story:
Hi, everyone! It’s Daniel, a.k.a. The Dancing Grad, here, asking for your help to take my competitive ballroom music directing career to the next level. 

tl;dr: I’m trying to purchase a used minivan to make the process of bringing my equipment to and from competitions much easier. If you contribute to my campaign, you'll get personalized playlists and commentaries OR *discounted* rates for my music director fees for an upcoming competition. See the video above or the perks structure to the right for details!

What’s happened since I’ve started? // I started operating in the fall of 2014 after a successful Indiegogo campaign to raise funds for sound equipment raised 125% of the original goal within a few months. Since then, I have become the music director for dozens of competitions spanning the Atlantic seaboard and the Gulf of Mexico. Collegiate competition credits include Harvard Beginners, UConn, DCDI, Tufts, BADC, Holy Cross, Worcester, BU, Harvard Invitational, and MIT. USA Dance and WDSF competition credits include the American Dancesport Festival, the New England Fall Challenge, Liberty Ball, and many of the country’s largest National Qualifying Events, including the Manhattan Amateur Classic (MAC), the New England Dancesport Championships, the Mid-Atlantic Championships, and the Gumbo Dancesport Championships. 

Why do I need my own car? // After being in operation for three years and taking stock of the business’ finances, I’ve come to realize that one consistent expense that sometimes catches both the competition organizers and myself by surprise is that of a rental car to shuttle my equipment back and forth. To bring my four speakers, subwoofer, soundboards, cables, and trolley, I will use either a rental car agency at the nearest airport or Zipcar to secure at least a mid-size SUV. Those costs add up, between the daily rates, the loss damage waivers, and the gas, sometimes resulting in an expense to the competition or to myself that is greater than the fee that I collect from the competition.

So, I have decided to purchase a used minivan to eliminate the largest costs associated with a rental car or Zipcar (namely the daily rates and the loss damage waivers). While a minivan has more space than my equipment currently needs, it will be very useful in case I expand my sound equipment collection in the future (e.g., a second subwoofer, a fifth or sixth speaker). Having my own car will also ease the budgetary concerns of competitions who reimburse me for a rental car, as the remaining costs (gas, mileage) often make up only about 10% of what a full car rental costs.

How can you help? // I’m looking to raise funds to purchase the car and get it registered and insured. While I have some funds set aside for it, your monetary help can ensure that I can purchase a better quality used car and maintain it for hopefully many competition seasons. My perks structure is meant to incentivize both individuals invested in getting quality music at a competition and competition organizers and teams, either in the form of playlists or a credit for my fee for your competition this academic year. Take a look at what you can get at various levels of donation.

Thank you! // It’s been a wild ride from summer 2014 up until this point, and I’m grateful to every dancer and every competition organizer that’s taken a chance on me and let me share my love of music with dancers across the country. I’m looking forward to many more competitive seasons amongst these great groups of dancers, and I’m hoping you can help me ease the monetary strain of it by helping me purchase a used minivan.

story:
NO MORE COLD BURRITOS

Every year, millions of burritos get cold before they're eaten.

Burrito Vest insulates your precious cargo for the journey from burrito purveyor to consumption location. Together, we can prevent cold burritos. 

It's literally your favorite puffy vest in perfect burrito size. 

Made of recycled materials to keep your burrito hot and the planet cool. 

I LOVE BURRITOS

As a grad student, I eat a lot of burritos. I’ll patronize any and all purveyors of tortilla wrapped goodness. Including but not limited to:

  • Food trucks
  • Big chains
  • Local spots
  • That sketchy gas station on an otherwise deserted rural highway

 

This endless quest for the perfect burrito often leads me far from my ultimate consumption location (home or school) which poses a pretty big problem - time.

Time rapidly slips away from all of us, but even more so if you’re a burrito. Every minute a burrito spends unconsumed, precious degrees of warmth are lost. Science tells us that peak burrito temperature occurs at time of construction, and it’s all downhill from there.

Fed up with cold burritos, I developed Burrito Vest to insulate my burrito the same way my favorite puffy vest insulates me. Burrito Vest is a solution to my own problem, but if you like getting burritos to go (which is basically our only option in 2020), I think Burrito Vest can help you too.

IF YOU LOVE BURRITOS

The prototype turned out so well that I placed a small order. The first shipment of Burrito Vests is on schedule for delivery in December 2020 so place an order to reserve yours in time for the holidays. 

If demand is great enough, the next inventory order will have a Q1 2021 delivery, so any order outside of the first shipment will be considered a pre-order. These are scheduled to ship by March 2021. 

Burrito Vest is the perfect gift for any burrito lover, so buy a multi-pack, save a few dollars, and spread the warmth. 

SPREAD THE WARMTH

Not ready to order a Burrito Vest? That's okay! Sharing this campaign with friends, family, or strangers that love burritos can go a long way.

story:
Насолоджуйтесь текстом українсько-англійської суміші:

HELP US

TO RECOVER OUR CONSTRUCTION BUDGET

Early summer, in the pandemic year of 2020, we all felt a strong desire for nature and freedom. So we went out to find a piece of land, not too far from Kyiv, to build "the cottage of our dreams": A modern, ecological, bright and spacious little house, available for everyone who desires fresh air, healthy nature and an unforgettable panorama.

На початку літа 2020 року, року пандемії, ми всі відчували сильний потяг до природи і свободи. Тож ми вирушили на пошуки ділянки, недалеко від Києва, щоб побудувати "будинок мрії": Сучасний, екологічний, світлий та просторий будиночок, доступний кожному, хто бажає свіжого повітря, чистоїприроди та неймовірних видів.

Thanks to 150 crowd-funders, who financed a part of the construction-budget, we started to build a wooden house with big windows. But after 7 week of construction, the nearly finished house, was set on fire.

Завдяки 150 краудфандерам, які профінансували частину бюджету на будівництво, ми почали будувати наш дерев'яний будинок з великими вікнами. Але після 7 тижнів будівництва майже готовий будинок підпалили.

The reason for the fire appears to be a legal conflict in Kyiv, which has nothing to do with the project itself or it's initiator Marc Wilkins. 

Причиною пожежі став, ймовірно, правовий конфлікт в Києві, який не має нічого спільного з самим проектом або його ініціатором Марком Вілкінсом.

We initiated an investigation, activated our friends in politics, but most importantly, received the support and encouragement of thousands of Ukrainians, friends and neighbours.

Ми розпочали розслідування, активізували наших друзів у політиці, але головне, отримали допомогута підтримку тисяч українців, друзів та сусідів.

Візуалізація нашого майбутнього будинку в його оригінальному розташуванні.

Now we will build the same house again. Stronger, and even more beautiful, but following the original principles of ecology, openness and optimism.

І тепер ми знову будуємо наш будинок. Ми збудуємо його надійнішим і красивішим, але за тими ж принципами дизайну і екологічності, відкритості і оптимізму.

We need your help to re-finance the USD 25,000 we lost in the fire.

Нам потрібна ваша допомога для того, щоб зібрати 25 000 доларів США, які ми втратили в пожежі.

LOCATION: VYTACHIV    МІСЦЕ ЗУСТРІЧІ: ВИТАЧІВ

Вид з нашої майбутньої тераси. View from our future terrace.

Just 60 km south of Kyiv, right outside the picturesque village of Vytachiv, is our 4400m2 wonderfully lonely land plot, which we called The Little Riverbird's Estate. Surrounded by old oak- and apricot trees, the wild piece of land embraces the visitor with a perfect feeling of adventure and solitude.

Лише за 60 км на південь від Києва, одразу за краєм мальовничого села Витачів, знаходиться наша дивовижна усамітнена земельна ділянка площею 4400 м2, яку ми назвали The Little Riverbird’s Estate (садибою Маленької Річкової Пташки). Завітавши до цієї дикої землі, оточеної старезними дубами та абрикосами, сповнюєшся відчуттям неймовірних пригод та усамітненості.

THE ARCHITECTURAL CONCEPT BY VLADMIR VESHTAK

АРХІТЕ КТУРНА КОНЦЕПЦІЯ: ВОЛОДИМИР ВЕШТАК

Візуалізація майбутнього будинку в оригінальному середовищі.

We are creating a 75m2 house which is facing, with it's big terrace and panoramic windows, the rising sun and the majestic Dnipro River. It will have two bedrooms, two sleeping-galleries for friends or kids, a fireplace and an open kitchen, from where you can watch the wind in the silver trees, while cooking a mushroom risotto.

Ми будуємо будинок площею 75 м2, відкритий своєю великою терасою та панорамними вікнами висхідному сонцю та величній річці Дніпро. У будинку будуть дві спальні, дві спальні-галереї для друзів чи дітей, камін та відкрита кухня, з вікон якої ви зможете спостерігати за вітром, що грає у срібних деревах, поки ви готуєте різотто з грибами.

The Riverbird's Nest can accommodate four people in full comfort. With kids, friends or surprise-visitors, the little house can easily host up to 8 people.

The Riverbird's Nest комфортно вміщає 4 людини, але з дітьми, друзями або раптовими-відвідувачами, маленький будинок може легко розмістити до 8 гостей.

Візуалізація вітальні з оригінальним видом.

A creative corner calls for writing, drawing and dreaming.

Схованка для творчості так і запрошує щось написати, намалювати, або ж просто помріяти.

 As each room is oriented towards the river, this will be the view from your pillow.

Оскільки кожна спальня «дивиться» на річку, таким буде вид з вашої подушки.

THE CONSTRUCTION METHOD

МЕТОД БУДІВНИЦТВА

It's important for us to build our house with ecological materials, but make it safe and strong at the same time. After extensive research, we decided to build the walls with pressed Ukrainian rye-straw-panels, which have a positive eco-footprint and create a perfect climate for the residents of the house . Thanks to a layer of plaster and clay, the walls will be robust and enduring.

Для нас важливо побудувати дім з екологічних матеріалів, але водночас зробити наш будинок безпечним та міцним. Після наполегливих пошуків ми вирішили побудувати стіни з блоків з пресованого жита,  виготовлених в Україні, які мають позитивний екологічний слід і створюють ідеальний мікроклімат для мешканців будинку. Завдяки шару гіпсу і глини, стіни будуть надійними і міцним.

THE TIMING. РОЗКЛАД

End of November we carefully poured a solid foundation, which will settle into the ground perfectly over winter:

В кінці листопада ми обережно залили міцний фундамент, який за зиму ідеально осяде в землі:

In January we will produce the straw-panels in a warm workshop and assemble them as soon as the spring sun rays will warm up Vytachiv. We expect The Riverbird's Nest to be ready for it's first visitors early May 2021.

У січні ми виготовимо солом’яні панелі в теплій майстерні. Та як тільки перші сонячні промені зігріють Витачів, змонтуємо їх на ділянці. Ми очікуємо, що " The Riverbird's Nest " буде готовий до перших відвідувачів на початку травня 2021 року.

THE FIRE: WHY? 

ПОЖЕЖА: ПРИЧИНИ ТА МАЙБУТНЯ БЕЗПЕКА

Who did it? How can we be sure that it will not happen again? 

Хто це зробив? Як ми можемо бути впевнені, що це не станется знов?

It took many weeks to digest this senseless attack. In collaboration with the police, we are investigating the arson. But as the investigation is ongoing, we can not reveal too much information about the case. 

Багато тижнів пішло на усвідомлення та прийняття цієї дивної атаки. У співпраці з поліцією ми розслідуємо підпал. Але оскільки розслідування триває, ми не можемо розкрити занадто багато інформації про справу.

Marc, the original initiator of The Riverbird's Nest, partnered with a kind hearted investor, to start the project. But he was involved in a court-case against a controversial construction in Kyiv. After verbal threats against the co-investor, the construction site was set on fire.

Марк,  ініціатор та перший засновник The Riverbird's Nest, співпрацював із доброзичливим інвестором на початку проекту. Він брав участь у судовій справі проти спірного будівництва в Києві. Після словесних загроз будівельний майданчик було підпалено.

Afterwards he transferred his shares to our wonderful new partner Andrii Bozhok. With this new constellation,  we are confident that our project is not "in the line of fire" any longer.

Згодом він передав свою частку в проекті нашому новому чудовому партнеру Андрію Божку. З цим новим партнерством ми впевнені, що наш проект більше не знаходиться "на лінії вогню".

Despite having experienced the fire, we will never build walls around our little house, set up barbed wire or invite security men with german shepherds, as some friends suggested.  This atmosphere of mistrust and pessimism is exactly what we want our guests to forget, when residing at the house. Instead, we will develop our relationship to all the neighbours, making deeper our connections with residents of the village, who connect to our story and have their watch full eyes on THE RIVERBIRD’S NEST.

Незважаючи на те, що ми пережили пожежу, ми не будуємо і ніколи не будуватимемо паркан навколо нашого будиночка, не будемо встановлювати колючий дріт чи наймати охоронців з німецькими вівчарками, як пропонували деякі друзі. Ця атмосфера недовіри та песимізму - саме те, про що ми хочемо, щоб наші гості забули, гостюючи в Riverbird`s Nest. Натомість ми будемо розвивати наші стосунки з нашими сусідами, надалі зміцнюючи зв’язки з жителями села, які співчувають нашій історії та пильнують за будинком.

Additionally, we will hire a land-keeper, who will care for all the fruit trees, make small repairs, and maybe guide some of our guests to the best secret fishing spots down by the river.

Крім того, ми наймемо помічника, який буде доглядати за усіма фруктовими деревами, дбати про ремонт та слідкувати та лагодити будиночок й, можливо, ділитися з нашими гостями секретами найкращих таємних місць для рибальства.

We will care for high occupancy. Enchanted by the picturesque  panorama, the beautiful wilderness and the romantic fire-place, all seasons are perfect for inspiring days at The Riverbird's Nest. We will make sure that the house will never stay empty.

Ми подбаємо про те, щоб у будинку завжди хтось знаходився. Завдяки мальовничій панорамі, красі дикої природи та романтичному затишку каміна, усі пори року ідеально підходять для надихаючих днів у Гніздечку.

Nevertheless, we will install a modern security system inside the house, which will trigger alarm and call a close-by security team immediately. 

Разом з тим, ми встановимо сучасну систему охорони всередині будинку. За необхідності, сигналізація спрацює і миттєво викличе бригаду охорони.

The Riverbird's Nest will stay free and wild, but will be watched and protected.

The Riverbird's Nest залишатиметься вільним і диким, але за ним спостерігатимуть і захищатимуть.

ЗАСНОВНИКИ. FOUNDERS.

Born in Switzerland, Marc Wilkins is a film-director who moved from New York to Kyiv, inspired by the Revolution of Dignity in 2013-2014. He found his new home in the heart of Kyiv, where he co-founded the gallery for contemporary art THE NAKED ROOM, joined URBAN SPACE 500 and continues creating movies and commercials. His short film, BON VOYAGE, was shortlisted for the Academy's 89th Prize, his debut feature film THE SAINT OF THE IMPOSSIBLE premiered in 2020.

Марк Вілкінс, народжений у Швейцарії, — режисер, який переїхав з Нью-Йорка до Києва, натхненний Революцією гідності у 2013-2014 роках. Він віднайшов свій новий дім у серці Києва, де став співзасновником київської художньої галереї THE NAKED ROOM та одним із URBAN SPACE 500, продовжуючи знімати кіно та рекламу. Його останній короткометражний фільм BON VOYAGE потрапив у шорт-лист 89-ї премії Академії, прем’єра його першого повнометражного фільму THE SAINT OF THE IMPOSSIBLE відбулася у 2020 році. . 

Andrii Bozhok was born in Ukrainka, just a few kilometers away from Vytachiv. He was dreaming of creating a tranquil retreat with a magnificent view over Dnipro since his first visit to the area more than ten years ago. Andrii is involved in a variety of cultural, social and entrepreneurial projects, primarily in publishing and nature protection.

Андрій Божок народився в Українці, лише за кілька кілометрів від Витачева. Він мріяв створити місце для усамітнення та відпочинку з неймовірним краєвидом на Дніпро з часу першого візиту до Витачева понад десять років тому. Андрій залучений у різноманітні культурні, соціальні та підприємницькі проекти, переважно видавничі та спрямовані на захист довкілля.

ДЯКУЄМО, ЩО ПРИЄДНАЛИСЯ, ПРОФІНАНСУВАЛИ І / АБО ПОДІЛИЛИСЯ В СОЦІАЛЬНИХ МЕДІА НАШОЮ МРІЄЮ ПРО ІДЕАЛЬНИЙ МАЛЕНЬКИЙ БУДИНОК З ВИДОМ НА ДНІПРО.

THANK YOU FOR JOINING, FUNDING AND/OR SHARING OUR DREAM OF THE RIVERBIRD’S NEST OVERLOOKING THE DNIPRO RIVER

FOR YOU, ME AND EVERYONE WHO SEEKS FREEDOM.

Візуалізація нашого майбутнього будинку в його оригінальному розташуванні. 

P.S. Interested in watching our first crowdfunding campaign?

https://igg.me/at/1UutXrcd5io/x/6221634#/
story_txt:
Насолоджуйтесь текстом українсько-англійської суміші:HELP USTO RECOVER OUR CONSTRUCTION BUDGET
Early summer, in the pandemic year of 2020, we all felt a strong desire for nature and freedom. So we went out to find a piece of land, not too far from Kyiv, to build "the cottage of our dreams": A modern, ecological, bright and spacious little house, available for everyone who desires fresh air, healthy nature and an unforgettable panorama.На початку літа 2020 року, року пандемії, ми всі відчували сильний потяг до природи і свободи. Тож ми вирушили на пошуки ділянки, недалеко від Києва, щоб побудувати "будинок мрії": Сучасний, екологічний, світлий та просторий будиночок, доступний кожному, хто бажає свіжого повітря, чистоїприроди та неймовірних видів.Thanks to 150 crowd-funders, who financed a part of the construction-budget, we started to build a wooden house with big windows. But after 7 week of construction, the nearly finished house, was set on fire.Завдяки 150 краудфандерам, які профінансували частину бюджету на будівництво, ми почали будувати наш дерев'яний будинок з великими вікнами. Але після 7 тижнів будівництва майже готовий будинок підпалили.The reason for the fire appears to be a legal conflict in Kyiv, which has nothing to do with the project itself or it's initiator Marc Wilkins. Причиною пожежі став, ймовірно, правовий конфлікт в Києві, який не має нічого спільного з самим проектом або його ініціатором Марком Вілкінсом.We initiated an investigation, activated our friends in politics, but most importantly, received the support and encouragement of thousands of Ukrainians, friends and neighbours.Ми розпочали розслідування, активізували наших друзів у політиці, але головне, отримали допомогута підтримку тисяч українців, друзів та сусідів.Візуалізація нашого майбутнього будинку в його оригінальному розташуванні.Now we will build the same house again. Stronger, and even more beautiful, but following the original principles of ecology, openness and optimism.І тепер ми знову будуємо наш будинок. Ми збудуємо його надійнішим і красивішим, але за тими ж принципами дизайну і екологічності, відкритості і оптимізму.We need your help to re-finance the USD 25,000 we lost in the fire.Нам потрібна ваша допомога для того, щоб зібрати 25 000 доларів США, які ми втратили в пожежі.LOCATION: VYTACHIV    МІСЦЕ ЗУСТРІЧІ: ВИТАЧІВВид з нашої майбутньої тераси. View from our future terrace.Just 60 km south of Kyiv, right outside the picturesque village of Vytachiv, is our 4400m2 wonderfully lonely land plot, which we called The Little Riverbird's Estate. Surrounded by old oak- and apricot trees, the wild piece of land embraces the visitor with a perfect feeling of adventure and solitude.Лише за 60 км на південь від Києва, одразу за краєм мальовничого села Витачів, знаходиться наша дивовижна усамітнена земельна ділянка площею 4400 м2, яку ми назвали The Little Riverbird’s Estate (садибою Маленької Річкової Пташки). Завітавши до цієї дикої землі, оточеної старезними дубами та абрикосами, сповнюєшся відчуттям неймовірних пригод та усамітненості.THE ARCHITECTURAL CONCEPT BY VLADMIR VESHTAKАРХІТЕ КТУРНА КОНЦЕПЦІЯ: ВОЛОДИМИР ВЕШТАК
Візуалізація майбутнього будинку в оригінальному середовищі.We are creating a 75m2 house which is facing, with it's big terrace and panoramic windows, the rising sun and the majestic Dnipro River. It will have two bedrooms, two sleeping-galleries for friends or kids, a fireplace and an open kitchen, from where you can watch the wind in the silver trees, while cooking a mushroom risotto.Ми будуємо будинок площею 75 м2, відкритий своєю великою терасою та панорамними вікнами висхідному сонцю та величній річці Дніпро. У будинку будуть дві спальні, дві спальні-галереї для друзів чи дітей, камін та відкрита кухня, з вікон якої ви зможете спостерігати за вітром, що грає у срібних деревах, поки ви готуєте різотто з грибами.The Riverbird's Nest can accommodate four people in full comfort. With kids, friends or surprise-visitors, the little house can easily host up to 8 people.The Riverbird's Nest комфортно вміщає 4 людини, але з дітьми, друзями або раптовими-відвідувачами, маленький будинок може легко розмістити до 8 гостей.Візуалізація вітальні з оригінальним видом.A creative corner calls for writing, drawing and dreaming.Схованка для творчості так і запрошує щось написати, намалювати, або ж просто помріяти. As each room is oriented towards the river, this will be the view from your pillow.Оскільки кожна спальня «дивиться» на річку, таким буде вид з вашої подушки.THE CONSTRUCTION METHODМЕТОД БУДІВНИЦТВАIt's important for us to build our house with ecological materials, but make it safe and strong at the same time. After extensive research, we decided to build the walls with pressed Ukrainian rye-straw-panels, which have a positive eco-footprint and create a perfect climate for the residents of the house . Thanks to a layer of plaster and clay, the walls will be robust and enduring.Для нас важливо побудувати дім з екологічних матеріалів, але водночас зробити наш будинок безпечним та міцним.
